name: Rhonda Carter
text: Tonya or Tanya was very unprofessional and rude.  I had to call the company 3 times and was told by her 3 times I would receive a call back with a schedule pick up time. They never returned my call or scheduled a pick up time. I had to call the Home Depot and get another company to come out. I would not recommend this company to anyone!

name: Nathan Pelfrey
text: I worked for this company as a driver for a very short time. When I received the offer as a driver we had negotiated my pay and when I received my first check it wasn't  even half of the amount we agreed on. They told me that oh there's a training period you have to go through until we think you are trained and I asked them why they failed to mention that when they first hired me. I decided to just ignore it and see if I get payed the agreed amount the next check and I did. The next time they asked if I would make another trip for them on my way back and they would pay me a good amount so I agreed and once I received my check it was only half of the agreed upon amount. The company still owes me the money to this day so I warn anyone thinking about working for this guy. While I was working there the owner was having to go to court numerous times because they stole the furniture they were originally supposed to deliver because they had a contract with Ashley Furniture.

name: David Kidd
text: AVOID THIS COMPANY.  THERE EMPLOYEES ARE RUDE AND UNPROFESSIONAL.  THEY PERFORM CONTRACT DELIVERY FOR HOME DEPOT AND I HAVE REPORTED THEM.  THEY DROPPED MY SHIPMENT IN MY YARD AND THEN CALLED ME TO SAY THEY DELIVERED.  YOU CAN SEE THE FROM THE WEIGHT IN PICTURES, I HAD NO WAY TO MOVE THEM INSIDE MY GARAGE.  TO ADD INSULT TO INJURY, THE DAY THEY DROPPED WAS MY DAUGHTER'S WEDDING, AND DIDN'T EVEN DELIVER WHEN THEY SUPPOSEDLY SAID THEY WERE COMING.  THEY DROPPED IN MY YARD AT 6:15AM WELL OUTSIDE THERE DELIVERY TIME.  ****YOU HAVE BE WARNED******  IF THAT ISN'T ENOUGH, THEY DROPPED MY TOOLCHEST OFF THE TRUCK AND DAMAGED IT.  I'M NOT GOING TO SAY ANY MORE OTHER THAN I CALLED HOME DEPOT AND THEY ARE MAKING IT RIGHT.  I DON'T LIE.  SOME OWNER.. I CALLED TO LEAVE MESSAGE NO RETURN CALL.

name: Blake Bishop
text: No reply after 5 days of them having my package n scheduled delivery times set up on line they have made not me. N I had someone waiting at house. 15hrs wasted oh they don't answer there phones

name: Shaneka Caves
text: I'm rating this place a one... Sorry delivery guys  you were great but the dispatcher lied to Amazon... I ordered a treadmill from Amazon set the delivery and all for a Saturday. I get the call from this delivery service asking me to change my delivery date to Wednesday. I said no ma'am I specifically asked for Saturday because I will be available. She tells me we cant do Saturday because her guys are off and have a wedding to attend. I'm thinking to myself how is that my problem. I waited at home all day Saturday for the delivery and then called Amazon around 5pm wanting to know where is my delivery.  I explained the situation and she then called the dispatcher and she told the Amazon specialist that they just received the shipment although on the Amazon system it says it arrived the day the dispatcher called me. Needless to say I had to wait until Monday to receive my order. AMAZON IF YOU READ THIS I HOPE YOU RECONSIDER CONTRACTING THIS COMPANY OUT TO FULFILL YOUR CUSTOMERS ORDERS!!!!

name: Chris Roberts
text: Attempted to call multiple times to talk about when package would/should be delivered with no response at all. Left voicemails and still no call back. Also they only want to do what is convenient for them and not what the customer originally agreed to.

name: Robbie Mott
text: When Andrew and Ryan arrived, they assessed the situation, organized a plan, and worked extremely hard to get all the items to the (second-floor) room in which I needed them. They were friendly, professional, and courteous!

name: Sebastian Franklin
text: Very happy with the services offered to our company.  We have been using 3D Delivery service for shipping several pallets of product from mobile to Nashville and Atlanta.  Very happy with their eagerness to please.

name: Fixit Spot
text: Excellent Service and communication. Delivered office furniture to our location, called us 3 days prior to setup time and date and driver arrived on time.  Was friendly and helped us place it where we wanted.

name: Haztala Sayozi
text: Fantastic service.  My nordic track was delivered within 2 days of confirmation.  They even assembled it for me and had it up and running n under an hour.

name: Craig Beckta
text: We have used 3D Delivery for several years, for our businesses.  We have used them to transport single pallets to truck loads on short trips from Mobile to Pensacola, to as far as Pensacola to Houston.  Billy is a great guy and easy to work with.

name: Dick Bowman
text: Our company has used 3D for about a year to do white glove residential delivery's of furniture.  Have had excellent results.

name: Rene Horton
text: Our company has used 3d delivery service for several long hauls from Houston to New Orleans and Houston to Pensacola.  Our experience with 3d has been nothing but great.

name: Tiffani Grzybowski
text: Will wait forever depending on time of day

resp.text: WOW Tiffany, you have the wrong Transportation Service. When did you book a pickup with me? Although, I am not perfect but having someone wait forever, isn't how I handle my business. Don't leave False Reviews...

name: Katie Carpenter Stuhr
text: Safely drove my parents home after a late flight - we'll call her again - thank you!

resp.text: Katie, it was my pleasure to provide your parents transportation services!!! You're welcome! Thank you for sharing your appreciation.🌻😁🤗

name: Kathy Milton
text:
She picked me up at the airport and my destination was about an hour away.  We chatted and had a great conversation!! She kept her eyes on the road. I am a nervous passenger but when she was cutoff by the same car TWICE she maintained control, and handled the maneuver correctly to avoid collision but not toss me around.
Lovely lady and I am so glad I found her to take me to my destination!

resp.text: Kathy, it was a pleasure to meet & have a wonderful conversation with you! Thank you so much for sharing your Ride Experience. I pray the best for you and your family!

name: Lorin Smith
text: Eunice Paige is an amazing woman and will serve you with genuine quality. I highly recommend her services.

resp.text: Thank you Lorin for giving me a wonderful Review. You are a God sent today. It was a blessed pleasure to have met you today!😁💥🙏💥

name: Dave Perkins
text: Friendly, personable, professional, on-time and reasonably priced. A pleasure to work with. Will be using her service again for sure! A+++++

resp.text: Dave, thank you for your great Review, business & the wonderful opportunity to provide transportation services, to you today! Welcome to Huntsville, AL.😁

name: Gabriel Wigfall
text:
I absolutely love this Taxi business. The driver(s) are always on time, and if she is not in your pick up area, she will communicate to you how long it will take and still manage to arrive early. She is very polite and straight forward. She picked me up when I did not know how I would get home. I immediately call the Taxi Lady and she went out of HER way to pick me up.

IF YOU NEED A RIDE HOME, CALL THE TAXI LADY PHONE...

resp.text: Gabriel, thank you so very much for your amazing Review. I appreciate you taking the time to express your gratitude for my transportation services. It's my pleasure!Peace

name: Donna Lasseter
text: Very nice and pleasant but very hard to get a ride with her

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Donna for your Review. In the near future I am endeavoring to expand my Transportation Services by providing more vehicles/Drivers. However, currently, I am my only Driver and at times the demand for rides is greater than I alone can fulfill. It's an honor & a pleasure to have the opportunity to answer the Call of EXPANSION of business that I have been so GRACIOUSLY given by my Abba Father; to be of service to others...

name: Salted Cracker
text: We tried to call this taxi service and she hangs up on us as we are in mid conversation! Horrible horrible service ! I do not recommend to anyone !

resp.text:
The times that I have actually hung up on a caller are when the person is demeaning, rude, confrontational and lacks reason/understanding, and or abusive. It's my pleasure to treat people with kindness & dignity. Your review doesn't speak truthfully concerning the Transportation nor Customer Services that I provide.
Eunice Paige🌻

name: Q khan
text: Very rude. When I called and asked for service , the reply was (I don’t work ) and she hang up .

resp.text: Hello Q Khan, I apologize for offending you. It would be nice to know how I was rude to you, instead of you just giving me a 1-star review and stating that I was very rude. I really feel sorry for you and others who have missed used your ability to Rate a business unjustly. I hope that you can find true joy and love in life and learn to be kind to yourself as well as others. PEACE

name: Totyjoe
text: I've traveled with her a few times now, and every time she has been punctual and extremely nice. The Taxi Lady is my go to taxi service!

resp.text: Patrick, thank you so very much for your amazing Review! It's my pleasure to have the opportunity to provide transportation services for you & other UAH students & faculty. Have a blessed Thanksgiving & a safe, enjoyable time at home.

name: crin dima
text: Thank you taxi lady for saving the day. It was a pleasure meeting you. You are awesome! Hope you had a nice lunch...

resp.text: Mr.John Crin, thank you so very much for your kindness! It was a blessing to provide the wheels of service to you!

name: Max Miller
text: You cannot get this level of service from an Uber driver and I highly recommend the Taxi Lady anytime you are in Huntsville! Amazing service and great conversation. Eunice was so friendly and arrived right on time. She quoted me on the phone the day before so I knew exactly how much I was paying for the ride. She was an excellent driver and even was smart enough to take a detour because she had seen an accident before picking us up! We would’ve been waiting in standstill traffic otherwise. Thank you for getting us to the airport on time!

resp.text: Max, thank you for Highly recommending my Transportation Service. It is with great pleasure that I was given the opportunity to serve as your Driver. I wish you and your colleague safe travels and Much Success in your consulting careers!

name: Tonya Castleberry (Tonya36033)
text: She helped get my cousin food and cigarettes to him. She was wonderful and very pleasant to speak to.

resp.text: Tonya, thank you for your grateful appreciation of my Delivery Service. It's always a pleasure to assist when the opportunity becomes available!😁

name: Alberto Garcia
text: Bad and poor service   please update your location of service and stop wasting peoples time

resp.text:
Mi vida, it is most unkind for you to give me a 1-star review, when my business is based out of Huntsville Alabama. How did I waste your time you text me on a Sunday morning and I responded to you quickly. When I am able to accommodate someone in Decatur I do so. The type of trip request that you were asking for would be absolutely expensive for you to use me when there is another cab service in Decatur that can better accommodate picking up your child from school. I even gave you a suggestion but you weren't considerate of that and chose to give me a low rating. I am including your text to me just to let people know wait your request was of me:

Hello I need your service.
I have a child that would need to be transported to a special school mon and Tues here in decatur

name: Charity Barker
text: Phenomenal service from beginning to end! Eunice shared with me that Nashville is not typically her service area but she believed God had told her to go on this particular day... the day I needed a ride to the airport. Being the early hours of the morning, I was having a difficult time getting an Uber. I ended up canceling the driver I had been continuously waiting on because I was worried I wouldn't make it in time for my flight. I tried requesting a driver one more time, and Eunice showed up within minutes. We had church in the vehicle all the way to the airport. She even asked if she could pray with me. Whether Eunice realized it or not, she touched my heart that day in more ways than one. I'm thankful our paths crossed and would recommend her fabulous service to anyone. Thank you, Eunice! {Hebrews 6:10}

text: Awesome lady ♡

name: Rachel Ojani
text: Awesome service.  Highly recommend and will use her service again when I am in town

name: Lee Johnston
text: Eunice is the best ride in Huntsville. Honest, positive, and already on time. She has become a great friend and appreciate all she has done for many! Can’t go wrong with the Taxi Lady!

resp.text: Thank you Lee for your kind review of my transportation services to you! It was my pleasure to be your Driver & an amazing experience to have become friends with you! MUCH SUCCESS!!!!😃🔥💃🔥

name: McKenna Green
text: By far the best ride I've ever had. I called at 4:30 in the morning and she answered and got to me as quickly as she could. Great conversation that we had and was super sweet and understanding of my situation. I recommend 10/10

resp.text: McKenna, I am so very grateful that I was available & able to accommodate your Trip Request!!! It was my pleasure as well to have met & spoken to you. GOD'S  CONTINUOUS SUPERNATURAL CARE & ABUNDANCE OF BLESSINGS TO YOU & YOUR FAMILY!, IN JESUS NAME AMEN❗😃💥🙏💥

name: A L.
text: She’s my blessing in form of a human. We were able to talk like I knew her for years! Amazing! Thank you!

Remember to put Jesus FIRST on everything you do & keep your focus on what pleases Him FIRST & foremost❗😃💥🙏💥

name: Dawn Rodriguez
text: Very friendly and kind. Not many people like this anymore.

name: Evan Lunde
text: The mini van drip!  Why Uber when you can use “the taxi lady” ! Super sweet, very accommodating, and got me where I needed to 0 to 100!! Appreciate you luv!

resp.text: Evan, it was totally my pleasure meeting you, your Mom & Sister as my Uber Customer's while driving with the Rideshares in Nashville. What a blast we had on our way to the Grand Ole Opry. Enjoy the rest of your vacation & safe travels back home!!! Thank you for your amazing Review!!!😃😂😁

name: Osla McKercher
text:
Circumstances did not allow me to use The Taxi Lady's services, but WOW! She was very kind and so helpful when I called her. She sounds like a very sweet lady. I needed to schedule a midnight ride for someone. Since she doesn't drive that late at night, she couldn't do it, but she did take the time to talk and answer my questions about getting a ride in the area. Thanks Taxi Lady, and good luck!

Edited to add: I did actually end up using The Taxi Lady's services for a friend. I set up the service for my friend. The Taxi Lady is absolutely wonderful and my friend loved her, too! Very sweet and kind. I wish I could have met her in person and given her a big hug!

resp.text: Osla, WOW❗️Thank you for expressing your gratitude. It’s my pleasure to help, even if I am not able to be your Hired Driver. Thank you for requesting my transportation service.  Eunice Paige 🌻

name: cody melton
text: The ride and experience was perfect... very nice lady who helped me at the drop of a hat... would recommend over any other services 100%

resp.text: Cody, thank you for expressing your appreciation of my transportation service! It's my pleasure to make sure people get to where they want to go-to!

name: Kathy Mashburn
text: Eunice was great!  She picked me up with only about 45 minutes notice & we arrived at my destination with minutes to spare!  I would highly recommend her!

resp.text: Ms. Kathy, thank you so very much for giving your lovely comments about my transportation services. It was my pleasure to be your Driver.

name: Donna MacArthur
text: What a wonderful lady!  Great service, on time, and very friendly. I will defefinitly use her service in the future. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you, Donna for your Review of my transportation services. It was my pleasure to be your personal Driver.

name: Bamboo Web
text: Eunice is great.  My hotel called her early AM for a ride to the airport.  She said she was dropping someone off and would be back to pick me up in 15 minutes.  She arrived as promised, even a few minutes early.  I respect that a lot.  She likes you to schedule a ride ahead of time if you know you will need a ride, but not necessary.

resp.text: Thank you Boonjaka for your comments. I love providing transportation to assist you in going to your desired destination. It was my pleasure!

name: patricia allicocok-alshabazz
text: Credible driver  from since in tampa ive traveled have a pleasant personality and conscious of what she does safety and customer service is important to her.

resp.text: Thank you so very much for your Review of my transportation services. It's my pleasure to aim to provide excellence in all that I do.

name: L Pike
text: Eunice was excellent! Friendly, personable, and arrived ahead of schedule-- which was very helpful since I had an early flight out of HSV. A very safe ride and we arrived on time. I visit family in Huntsville on average every two months and I will definitely call "The Taxi Lady" every visit! She's kind--a safe driver-- friendly-- and adorable! Very pleased I found her!

resp.text: Thank you so very much for your review. It's my pleasure to serve as your Driver. Please forgive me for not responding sooner than now.

name: Dana Lacy
text:
If the taxi lady is available, she is  by far the best option in the Huntsville area.  She was very professional, prompt, personable,and with a very clean vehicle, in giving me a ride from Decatur to HSV.  Easily worth double the normal cab fair, but did not charge it.

Will be calling ahead to reserve her services in future trips through HSV.

Steve

resp.text: Steve, what an amazing heart felt encouraging review of my transportation service.  Thank you so very much for taking the time to give your comments. It's my sincere pleasure to have served as your Driver. Once again thank you!

name: Emma T
text: Eunice takes my granddad, who has dementia, from Rogersville to Madison on Mondays.  She is so kind and caring with him.  Also, she is very prompt!

resp.text: Thank you Emma, for expressing your appreciation of my providing transportation service to your granddad. It's a pleasure to have this opportunity. Thank you once again for your business.

name: deepinder singh
text: She is nice lady was quite friendly

resp.text: Thank you Singh for taking the time to express your kind regards of my service. It was my pleasure to provide transportation to you all!

name: jeff weaver
text: Dependable, reliable, interesting conversation if you so desire, and a warm heart in the excellent driver that uses a pretty clean van that has a/c, no smell and no unusual sounds like some cabs in HDV.

resp.text: Jeff, it was a pleasant experience to be your go-to Cab Driver while your were here in Huntsville, AL.

name: AngieB
text: I needed a ride to airport and training on Redstone. I did not want the hastle of downloading an app to get a ride so I saw the reviews for Eunice and decide to give her a try. She provide timley serivce with a smile. I actually used her several times while in the area and would use her again if I return. Thanks Eunice!!

resp.text: Angie, it was my pleasure to serve as your Driver. Thank you so very much for your business & your comments!

name: John Bilich
text: Eunice gets calls from me around the clock and always delivers with a friendly and courteous smile and service. She is best in her business anywhere!!

resp.text: Captain John, it's a welcome privilege & honor to transport your crewmembers to the Huntsville Airport no matter the hour. Thank you for your reoccurring business.

name: Young Chu Baker
text: “On time, very friendly and her car was very clean and comfortable.”

resp.text: Thank you Young Chu for expressing your appreciation for my transportation service.

name: Steve Neubauer
text: Eunice ROCKS ! Very personable, prompt and courteous, highly recommend her for your commute needs.

resp.text: Thank you Steve! I am grateful to serve as your personal Driver! Thank you for choosing to ride with me once again!😄

name: TJ Thompson
text: This lady is awesome

resp.text: Terrance, it was a blessing to met you & to make sure you reached your desired destination!!! Thank you so very much for your appreciation of my Transportation Service. May you & your family's Angels be encamped all around you all, keeping you SAFE & SOUND in all of your travels, in Jesus Name. AMEN!!!😁👌💥🔥🙏🔥💥

name: Daniel Chang
text: It's awesome to know that I can receive 5 star service with a taxi driver.  I have been skeptical in trying out Uber or Lyft due to the horror stories I hear.  I'm so glad I was able to find Eunice and her company and highly recommend her if you are flying or visiting Huntsville.  She's had a great attitude and so kind.  We had a little hiccup previously but so glad that I've found reliable taxi service in Huntsville.

resp.text: Daniel, please forgive me for not responding to your review sooner than now. Thank you for your comments. It's my pleasure to provide you with an excellent customer experience.

name: Manikandan Madhavan
text: Eunice is kind , friendly and safe driver.

resp.text: Manikandan, thank you for your positive reflections of my transportation service!

name: Lou Anne DeMattei
text: Five star service- reliable, on time, and courteous!

resp.text: Lou Anne, please pardon me for taking so long to respond to your wonderful review of my transportation service. Thank you so very much for your support!

name: Wegahta Tewolde
text: Rude driver. Didn't tell me there would be a $20 minimum until she arrived at my residence. And didn't even have a meter to track the distance I would be traveling.

resp.text: My apologies for not telling you about the $20 minimum. It was an honest oversight however. I did let you know before we began the trip. I am really not sure how I was rude to you since I waited for you even after you didn't answer me twice to let you know that I had arrived. You failed to state that I quoted you a Flat Rate charge of $30 for a Roundtrip to Wal-Mart that included Wait Time. However, you refused to agree to that FARE Cost & wanted to only pay $20. Since we could not agree on my stated cost you decided to leave out if my vehicle & go with contact another ride service.

name: Latoya Davis
text: I don't like her she's the worst anywhere she is so mean to me I'm on oxygen and it was taking me a little time to get in the car and she was really really really rushing me and it was making it hard for me to breathe and she said maybe if you lose weight it will not take you this long and she was looking at me like I was pathetic and pitiful she's pitiful please don't ride with her she is not good get someone else.she even called me nasty and disgusting please don't go anywhere with her and I used to stay with her and she treated me worst than the white folks treated me back in the slavery days no get

resp.text: Latoya Davis, I went over & above to help you in the time of your need. My heart went out to you due to your current health & living situation. How you can post a lie instead of the truth is less than acceptable. I sacrificed my own personal space, in order for the quality of your life to be better. For three days that I was able to assist you with transportation at no cost & a place to stay. May the Lord Jesus Christ be with you, forgive you, & cause you to treat others with kindness also consideration.

name: mirza ahmed
text: Great!!!!

resp.text: Mirza, thank you for expressing your kind thought. It was my pleasure to have the opportunity to meet your mobility need on yesterday & for the wonderful conversation. Thank your your business!

name: Weston N
text: Guys were friendly but unfortunately we didn’t a full move and had to pay close to a 1k when quoted something else. Now we are having to make trips all day to get the rest of our stuff. Not very pleased.

name: Jeff Sanders
text: Gave an honest quote over the phone. Called the day before to confirm final details. Showed up on time and brought a truck that was well able to move my items (see photo). Had protective cloths for my dining room table set. Moving to a 3 floor Apt wasn't an issue for them. They were kind, respectful, and easy to communicate with. We were able to move my stuff in a short amount of time. They even helped set up my furniture. Would recommend their services to anyone. Will use them again in the future.

name: Nicole Dasher
text: Company was invaluable at helping secure my move. They took care of packimg and unpacking and even secured my space for me and left my keys with my storage company. Above and beyond.

name: Greg Maynard
text: Outstanding service. They communicated well through the whole process leading up to the move. I would highly recommend using them if you have any moving needs.

name: Sharday Yorkshire
text: In January 2020 I had the pleasure of working with Moving the Coast of Orange Beach. They moved me from Florida to Louisiana. If you are looking for a company that is professional and on time... look no further. This companies professionalism is unparallel to any other I've worked with in the past. Thank you for making my move easy and totally stress free. God bless your company.

name: Todd Williams
text: My wife and I just used them on a short local move and they guys were prompt & professional. Cost was in line.  I would highly recommend them!

name: Makenzie Willis
text:
Very polite and on time. Didn't charge extra fees.
It was a very smooth and professional move.
I would recommend them to anybody.

name: Sand Marcus
text: They took our call last min around 7PM and was able to arrange a crew to come over 20 mins later to move a large dresser up a flight of stairs. They were fast, efficient, and easy to deal with. They will be getting our business again in the future.

name: Scott Rodgers
text: Wesley, Austin, and Caleb were very professional, careful, and good speed of work. Very reasonable rates and overall very good moving company. I would highly recommend using Henderson Moving and my family will be using them in the future.

name: Amanda Reed
text: Best moving experience ever!  We've used moving companies in the past that has just made the experience dreadful - bad attitudes, move like slugs etc.   These guys were all extremely friendly, courteous, quick movers.  They also did an amazing job of handling our things and making sure nothing was damaged.  Highly recommend, and I will definitely use them again in the future.  Can't say enough good things about them!

name: Eric Godsey
text: Straightforward with pricing, no hidden fees.  Very polite workers, safe and fast.  Would use again and recommend.

name: Emily Campbell
text: I have never in my life received such awful service. We have rescheduled my delivery 3 times and they keep not showing up nor contacting me. I have to reach out to them to even figure out that they aren’t delivering my package on said say. Also, I couldn’t seem to ever get anyone on the phone and when I did they were always giving me the run around. I would like at this point to just go get my package, but I CANNOT GET ANYONE ON THE PHONE!! Terrible, terrible service! I do not recommend them!!

name: Terry Starkey
text:
Great Delivery! The guys arrived ahead of time
(they did call and give me 45 minutes notice). They were pleasant and allowed me to check the Dresser out for any damage. Absolutley perfect! Thanks very much!

name: Chelsey Karr
text: Very appreciative of this company. They went out of their way to deliver tile we had ordered to our home in a timely manner. Can't speak highly enough about them.

name: Katlin Welborn
text: My dining table was unfortunately delayed by the manufacturer and the day before Thanksgiving was my last chance to get it! I called and spoke to the owner and he arranged for me to pick it up just a few hours after it arrived at their location! They were quick at loading it when we arrived and I was so thankful they allowed us to change the delivery plan to accommodate the holiday!

name: M Curtis
text:
While the manager called me by the wrong name several times, that is not a huge deal. I had to re-schedule delivery because I was out of town. I was told rudely she would have to call me back to do that. Once I finally heard back I was told a certain day and time, verified by my wife while phone was on speaker. I had to pay extra money for my child to stay in daycare because of the time of delivery. Nobody showed up at that time. After attempting to get the "manager" on the phone for one and a half hours, she informs me she messed up and got the day wrong. I then informed her how unprofessional this company is. The "manager" then went on to raise her voice and told me everybody makes mistakes! Now I have to get off work, again and pay extra child care cost.. again. And hope they show up this time for the delivery.

DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenience.

We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Monica Wiley
text: They did a great job in moving my items into my new home. They were very friendly and careful with my items.

name: DEEPoSEAN_
text: Fast, courteous, and on time. Moved my couch into my apartment without any fuss. Driver/mover called ahead of time, to give me a time frame for arrival. Would recommend to anyone moving large furniture.

name: Mary Ann Burgdorf
text: I had ordered white glove delivery service for an extra $150. Two young kids arrived and had to ask me to borrow a knife to open the boxes. That’s different. No white gloves and they didn’t seem to know what they were doing. They got the bed together and were leaving so I went back to look at it. Stains on the side of the upholstered bed frame so I refused it. I saw them load the bed back in the truck like it was firewood. They were supposed to have open the boxes at their warehouse and inspected it for damages which apparently they did not do. I was scared having them in my house.

name: Zack Nabras
text: They lost my shipments I called Over 60 time  they  don’t answer Given you run around bad service do not waste your money on your time

name: Melissa McAbee
text: My shipment was delivered on the promised day and early in the delivery window; communication was brief but professional and all in all it was a very easy, quick delivery.  After several poor experiences with much larger moving companies I'm glad to find a local one that treated me and my shipment with respect.

name: harrisonkl
text: i think they are GREAT.  The office staff is very polite,caring and compassionate and the moving crews are careful and diligent while not wasting time.  I engaged Henderson Moving to help with a very complicated move.  I am moving my elderly Mother from a Condo at the same time I am moving from a place out in the country.  We are moving in together in the family home.  We are doing this in several small moves and everyone at Henderson has gone out of their was to be helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We really appreciate it!

name: sandra jones
text: Henderson Transport and Storage is the BEST! Very customer service oriented! They keep you informed and they call the day prior to delivery and about 30 minutes just before delivery. The guys have delivered several very big and very heavy items from wayfair, and they are so gracious and pleasant! Such good service is one of the reasons I look at Wayfair first, I know that Henderson Transport will do the end delivery!

name: Blair Gilliland
text: Still have not received my desk and hutch from Wayfair. It was scheduled to be delivered on Friday September 6, from 2-6 and never showed up. Called the number several times that day, throughout the weekend, and this week so far. No one ever answers it or returns my messages. The voicemail is a woman's voice. She says Uh a lot and pauses so I can tell this is a personal number and just a couple folks running a "business" which terrifies me. Especially after seeing these other poor reviews, I'm worried IF my desk shows up at all it will be damaged and I'll have to refuse it and order a new one. This is a seemingly hopeless process and I do not recommend this company!

name: David Champion
text: Horrible delivery experience. Was schedule for delivery on Friday September 13th between 6pm and 9pm. Waited around all afternoon and never received items. Never even received a phone call or anything. Tried calling office and what do you know, they are only open until 2 pm. So I called wayfair and they rescheduled delivery with Henderson. Here it is September 19th and still nothing. I will not order anything else from wayfair if it’s delivered to me via Henderson.

name: jason baugh
text: They delivered my sofa within 2 days. They called and gave us updates as to when they would arrive. They brought it in and sat it where I wanted it. I was very pleased.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Jason! We really appreciate it!

name: Joan Prance
text: I have never in my life been treated like the owner of this company treated me.  I was called Monday and the deliver was set up for Wednesday at 6.  I am moving into an apartment from a house.  I waited and waiting and nothing.  I looked back at my confirmation email and it said that the delivery window was between 6 and 10 at night.  I was livid.  I had to call my ex to pick up my daughter at church at 7:30 because they never got to my apartment.  My daughter came to me and I had to keep her up on a school night.  I waited until  10 and still no call.  When I finally got them to answer on Thursday, the lady was extremely rude.  She said that the truck broke down which is understandable.  She said that her guys called everyone, but I never received a call.  She then said that she would deliver it Saturday at 5.  My daughter has a recital at 7 and I am sure they will not be there at 5.  I ask if they could come any early and she said that there are 20 people ahead of me.  I am not happy.  This company is awful and ran by rude, rude people.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers and apologize for the inconvenience. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Mitch Duros
text: I was sceptical after reading some of the reviews. Best decision I could have made giving this company a chance. Owner personally came for a free estimate and explained earlier problems under the old management. All new management. All new movers, carefully vetted. They showed up on time! They were friendly and courteous! They were fast, but treated my belongings with TLC.  They got me moved in less time than expected, which saved me money! I hate moving, but if I have to move again anytime soon, Henderson is the only company I’ll call.

name: Killin' Time
text: Worst experience ever! Could not deliver as promised so I said I would come get it. Agreed to meet at 1. They called me that morning to confirm the 1:00 time. I confirmed. Drove an hour to get there only to find a locked up warehouse.  Tried calling and only got machine. How these people stay in business I will never know.  Sat in parking lot for an hour waiting. Had to leave and drive an hour back home with my package. I will be contacting BBB....

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenience.

We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Alyson Antolick
text: Was not notified of cancelled delivery until 2 hours after expected. Although I was given a call day of at 730am to let me know it would be delivered that day. Reason for cancellation was "didn't have enough drivers" which to me you should line up drivers BEFORE setting your schedule. Seems like common sense to me, but I guess that's hard to find with Henderson Transfer and Storage. No thanks.

name: DR J.L. Phillips
text: They were polite but unable to help me. Thank you all the same.

name: Jessica Martin
text: I bought some furniture from wayfair and this company delivered and assembled it. They were very nice and did a great job. They were quick. The only bummer is that I was told they'd be here at 3 but didn't come until 6ish. I had to waste my day waiting but things happen I suppose. I would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Jessica, we really appreciate it!

name: Maria Whitten
text: Excellent service, delivery on Saturday and very punctual.

name: Ashley Curtis
text:
Our experience with this company had both its’ ups and downs. They called us on a Friday to say our furniture could be delivered Monday.  In the voicemail, the company rep kept calling my husband Michelle, when his name is Michael. When she realized halfway through the message that she made a mistake, she said’ “I think it’s supposed to be Michael and not Michelle...anyway...” No apology or anything. When we called to reschedule because we were out of town, the same rep said she would call us back with a new time and day. She never did. We called three times before actually getting someone on the phone. Same rep informed us it would be delivered Tuesday at 12/ noon. Okay. Great. So, Tuesday at noon rolls around, and no one is here. We waited until 1:30 before calling to check the status, to which we got nothing but the voicemail multiple times. When my husband finally got someone on the phone, the same rep informed us that our furniture was scheduled for delivery on Wednesday, not Tuesday. Clearly my husband was upset since we rearranged our schedules and paid extra to keep my daughter in daycare. So, she says our furniture will be delivered Wednesday at 12. Because we had issues with times, I decided to call to make sure it was set for 12, and the same rep, very rudely, began arguing with me about what she said the day before and the times. I was trying to get an estimated time, and she kept interrupting me, and she finally hung up. At this time, I was livid with the situation and called back. Here’s where the actual good part comes in. Said rep hands the phone to the company owner, who was extremely helpful. He listened without interrupting and sympathized with the situation. He informed me that delivery times are always approximately due to problems or delays with other scheduled deliveries and we would see our furniture between 12-4 on Wednesday. It was delivered before 12 the next day in great condition.

The reason why I am giving this company a 2 star instead of higher is solely bc of the rude and unprofessional receptionist.  She independently will run the company into the ground if she continues to act with other clients the way she did with us. I believe this company is a “mom and pop” family business, so I doubt she’ll be going anywhere. For future clients, be ready to deal with inconsistentency and an argumentative receptionist.

name: Bowbee Outdoors
text: No show for scheduled delivery. No notice, nothing. Now i have a empty living room until they deliver. Who knows when that will be, considering they do not contact you. Furthermore they told me it would be delivered on a saturday. Come to find out they arent even open. Dont see how it would be possible to run a business when your office is closed and your delivery drivers are enroute.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your review of our business. Customer satisfaction is our highest priority and we appreciate and take seriously all customer concerns. We do not have your name or contact information, but we would like to speak with you. Please contact us at (256) 734-9334 so that we may better understand and ensure your satisfaction. Thank you.

name: Chris M
text: They are horrible.  They called once and didn't reach anyone so, they simply didn't call back for days and then 30 minutes before they arrived at my home, called from a private cell phone number and didn't leave a message as to who they were and didn't deliver the mattress.  Then went so far as to say they would deliver when it was "worth it" to drive to my address.  I will lodge a formal complaint with Costco.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenience. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: bethlambrecht
text:
Worst experience ever with this company who delivered my furniture that I purchased from Wayfair. Not only were they rude to my husband during the first delivery, we NEVER received a courtesy call 30 minutes prior to the first time, and the second time we got the courtesy call it was the minute they stepped onto my porch. They never gave me time to arrive home. It was not a 30 MINUTE courtesy call as the lady at the front desk promised as well as
Wayfair.

When I text the delivery personel halfway home, he said it's a front porch delivery, it's already there. Now, while I realize we only paid for front porch delivery, the last time they dropped off the loveseat, they sat it inside the front door, we did not ask them to unpack, nor did we pay for that. BUT, he was very unempathetic, and did NOT care at all.  The delivery personel's attitude was very, very poor.  It was blocking the doorway LITERALLY and we could not get in the front door.  I WOULD NEVER USE THEM AGAIN FOR ANYTHING.

I contacted Wayfair and they handled it professionally and apologized for Henderson moving and storage for the way they handled the delivery. They made it right.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenience. We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Barry Stoner
text: An expensive piano was supposed to be picked up at a residence in Hanceville at 8:00 today Aug. 27, 2016 to be delivered this sat. morn to our Church in Cullman, City. We waited all morning long and as of 3:45 PM, still no piano.After several phone calls trying to track them down we discovered that the the piano wasn't picked up until 10 A.M.. They told the person in Hanceville that they didn't get back from a delivery in Tenn. until 3:00 A.M. this morning and that is why they were late getting there. If they plan on storing the piano in their truck this hot and humid weekend the heat can potentially cause the sounding board to crack and the piano would be ruined. Moving a piano is not a job for amateurs and judging by their failure to deliver as promised in a timely manner it appears that this company is not being run by professionals. I guess being on time and taking care of expensive merchandise is not a priority of this company. I called their office and got an answering machine and no cell phone to find out  the status of said deliver. I punched in their address found on the internet plugged it into the GPS and went looking for them to no avail. Needless to say our experience with this company is very frustrating and disappointing. It is now 4:00 P.M and I am going to Church one more time to see if their happens to be a moving truck off loading a piano.  If not, more to follow.

name: Simona Williams
text:
Negative four stars if that's possible. I have the same exact experience as the other reviews. No call to reschedule, when I was able to get the lady on the phone she was extremely rude, stating she had no idea how to contact the movers and they would give a thirty minute call prior to delivery. They said they would deliver at 10:30am. It's 4:10 and I'm still waiting for the call. To Make Matters worse leaving to go out of town. Can't get it reschedule until I
Come back. Ugh.

name: Brandy Lee
text: Amazing location!!! Very clean and friendly environment. Owners are very attentive and kind. Cheapest place yet! Washers are dryers worked fantastic! All around amazing experience.

name: goldie nelson
text: This place is not open the hours described. It's Sunday, 9:47am and it is closed.

text: Awesome place. The lady makes you feel right at home. Prices are great and sales very great.

name: Brittany W
text: First time walking in, they were very friendly, takes the time to talk about which juices are what. And they are very reasonable!! Great place to shop!

text: Wanted to quit smoking and checked several places and by far cape vapes is the best. Very knowledgeable about products that meet my needs

name: Charmaine Baker
text: Great places to come to first time being in here they're friendly and loving and caring.

name: Christina Trobaugh
text: Amazing place, great atmosphere, and I cannot stress enough that the customer service is spot on!! Love, love, love it!

name: Sandra Brannon
text: So I vaped about 7 years ago but went back to cigarettes.  Decided today to give vaping a try again.  Read the reviews here and was impressed, especially with the customer service high rep.  Well, they delivered!  Shawna was AWESOME!  Took the time to go over everything with me about vaping and nicotine and asked me questions to find the best fit for ME!  The prices are great but even if they were the priciest vape shop in town, the way you are treated and valued as a customer would be well worth it.  Shawna made sure  I knew exactly how to use my new mod and what to expect on my little no cig journey.  Capes Vapes, you have earned a loyal and appreciative customer.  Keep doing what you do! 🙌🏻

name: Devon Carnley
text: Friendly staff. Great deals. Highly recommended

name: Nolen Holbrook
text: Customer service was incredible and they helped me customize the vape to my liking. Sending all my friends to this place.

name: Nitasha Starr
text: The owner was very nice and thorough with answers to all questions.

name: David Barrett
text: Experience was amazing. Great customer service and prices.

name: Kaci Conrad
text: Best vape shop around amazing customer service😍😍😍😍😍😍💯💯💯💯

name: Crystal Gscheidle

name: James Gordon
text: Amazing atmosphere and even better customer service and you cannot beat her prices ! Gotta check her out ! Definitely will be returning !!

name: Gresko Amber
text: Love the owner, very friendly and the best vape shop I've been to in dothan. Will definitely recommend and be back again the prices are the best I've seen around the dothan area.

name: Kristen Johnson
text: Best vape shop in Dothan .... great prices and deals all the time .... best vape owner ever !!!! 😆💯

text: favorite vape shop in dothan. owner is super friendly and knowledgeable.

name: WastelandWitch
text: The owner was super nice! Love the prices and selections will definitely be back!

name: Jessica Walker-Wolford
text: Love the store,  the people and the prices.

name: Patrick Laakkonen
text: Amazing service amazing people

name: Hunter Norris
text: When speaking with this company 2 weeks ago I was told I couldn’t schedule an appointment more than 3 weeks out. I was told to call back and at a closer date. I called them back with a little more than 3 weeks notice as requested as well as sent a booking request as they previously instructed me to do. I received a return call from a very polite lady telling me the date had been reserved. I would be very hesitant booking from a company that doesn’t honor there previous comments and instructions. Either the person on the phone the other day wasn’t aware they could book me at that time or I was given the run around.Hope other find this helpful but don’t count on them as I did.

name: Regi Lorick
text: C&R Movers are my preferred movers of choice.  I have used this company several times for business and personal use. They are timely, handle items with care and are reasonably priced. I look forward to working with them in the near future.

name: Nancy Smith
text: I've moved several times but never experienced such experts as these. I highly recommend this company for moving and storage.

name: Laura Huckabee
text: We used C&R Movers when moving my elderly mother to a new house in Greenville AL. The guys took great care with all of her things, and were extremely efficient and professional.  I would highly recommend this company to anyone in the area.

name: MR. Truth
text: The person that answered the phone was professional in his response to my question

name: Ashley Copeland
text: We had Alphonzo, Chris, and Tony.  They were great.  They arrived a few minutes before start time and were very careful with our belongings.  Definitely glad we had them for the day.

name: David Benson
text: I could not have been more pleased with C&R Movers. We hired them for a local move between two locations that were not far apart, so the loading and unloading happened within a few hours of each other. They were timely, courteous, and responsible. They took better care of our things than I did and worked hard to make sure they met time. In fact, their work ethic alone was impressive, and speaks highly of the company and the team that was sent to support our move. Thank you so much!

name: Phillip K
text: I purchased a gun safe from a local store and contacted C&R Movers about delivering it to my residence and placing in selected room.  I called for a quote and then completed the required steps with my home computer.  The moving team showed up on time, were courtesy and professional and completed the move without any issue.  I was very pleased and HIGHLY RECOMMEND C&R Movers!!!!

name: Jamie Van Burren
text:
I have never hired movers before. Do I was clueless as to how all this works. I called 6-8 moving companies in Montgomery and they were the cheapest by a LANDSLIDE. That’s first off. Secondly the owner Chris spoke to me on the phone and answered my questions but after that it was tricky to get him to return my calls or texts in the same day. But regardless, he was always polite and helpful. A bit
Ore communication on procedures and when to expect emails and confirmations and a deposit would have been helpful if dealing with a new clueless person like myself but it still was fine. Then the movers: first: they were so punctual they were too punctual by about 30 minutes! Lol. That was awesome. Secondly DEVON was amazing. As far as customer service... super friendly and nice and I needed that. I was super stressed. DEVON is a priceless employee from what I saw. 3: BOTH Devon and Alex were SUPER FAST! very very careful with my things also but so fast! This company and these guys are not trying to ride the clock and charge you any more than you neeed to pay. Bottom line, INTEGRITY. From Chris and the movers. Just integrity all around. Alex was quiet but a very very hard worker too. Do to end the review; I am a tough one when it comes to customer service and I could not be more impressed with these guys and I will never use anyone else to move me, asking as I’m in Montgomery. My only suggestion would be from the Administrative side... if someone is not using the web sight to book and doesn’t know the routine... be a tad more communicative and call back sooner. But it all worked out and this , from a customers standpoint is a great company. With Integrity and not trying to rip you off. That’s huge. Thanks again to DEVON and ALEX for hustling like ya’ll did and making my move far less stressful!           Jamie Reisner.

name: Erin Billups
text: Very professional and time efficient. Price is affordable with great service. Will be using them again.

name: Wanda Berg
text: This move couldn't have gone better!! Lorenzo and Alphonso did an awesome job and were so nice to me. I will definitely use them again and recommend them to my friends. Thanks guys!!

name: Joseph Park
text:
Best of best ! Affordable price but still pursuing customer satisfaction...
Crews are very kind and professional. I'll work with them next year. It's good to see them enjoy their working even during hard work.
Thanks again

name: Yian Saephanh
text:
First and foremost, My experience with the company in a whole was not bad, BUT my personal experience with one of the female movers was just disappointing, after I pretty much befriended her and offered some of my unwanted things it came to my attention that she took advantage of my kindness, she was well aware of  the one spot I always place all of my jewelry of the day, as I finished packing in another room she proceeded to load up my bedroom. And as I went back into my room to put my ring on it was gone, but all other jewelry was there.

Making a claim with this company has been an absolute nightmare.

So in conclusion always be cautious of the people in your home whom you trust because THAT IS THEIR JOB.

resp.text: Hello, we sincerely apologize for your experience. We strive for perfection. Unfortunately, since you didn't notify us of a missing item and didn't submitted your claim until 3 months after your move, the claim process must take additional steps than normal, and this may take additional time on your claim.

name: DESTINIE LOWE
text:
They were very professional an polite while on duty. They were on time and completed everything perfectly. They have the best service and quality packing. This was by far my best experience.

Thanks Again!

name: Jessica DeAndrea
text: The movers were very professional and moved at a great pace. The movers arrived on time and were especially careful with my fragile items. I’d definitely use them in the future for another move.

name: Elizabeth Gordon
text: My best friend referred C&R Movers to me back in 2012, and I have used their services each time I've moved.  Thank you for making the process of moving a smooth transition.

name: Zy Rivers
text: I moved into my new home in May. C & R Movers were one of the best moving company l have EVER used. Everything was just the way it was when I packed it. C & R movers were sharp,  on time , and did exactly what was stated in the contract. C&R movers will also pack the entire house for you. I would have paid them to do it, if I didn't pack up everything  already. C&R movers are a MUST USE company when it comes down to moving.

name: shenna d
text: Horrible customer service. I first called and they had a slot available. The next day, they said they did not. Someone hung up in my face when I called. Then I called back I was told they would call me back. I never got a call back. Horrible, wish I could give zero stars.

resp.text: Sorry for any inconvenience you may have experience with our customer service department. We do book on a first come, first service basis. It seems like you called in on the first day and we were available. Then the second day u called back with intentions to book but your move date was taken. I’m unsure how we hung up if we told you the date is unavailable.

name: MC. Speirs
text: Very professional, friendly, and careful. I will definitely use them again.

name: sarai d
text: This is a very unprofessional place. I called and was told to book online. I followed the instructions and paid my deposit. On my moving date, no one showed up. I had to go through my credit card company to be refunded. Warning stay away from these scammers.

resp.text: You book through a third party company and unfortunately, we do not have control over your booking process. We advise when booking your service, book directly with the company. Sorry for this inconvenience.

name: Brenda J. Clausell
text: This was such a great group of guys. They were professional and took great care to wrap our furniture. They were hard working, wasting not one minute. Great Job !!!

name: Mello Jones
text: Terrible company to work for very unorganized they don’t maintain any kind of schedule. Worked with this company a week looking to receive pay but they give you the run around. Legal action seems the only way to get thru to such an unprofessional company.

resp.text: First we will like to apologize to the customers for having to read this. C & R Movers pride ourselves on providing a very detail employment hiring process. After reading this, additional steps will be added to the hiring process. To Mr. Jones thanks for the one week employment. Please make sure you put your current address and not your mothers address on payment information. Thank you and have great day.

name: Jalicia Vaughn
text: They were friendly and very hard workers. I was stressed about the move and they made it easy. They were wonderful!

name: Timothy Phillips
text: They did a great job. I was super grateful. Highly recommended.

name: karen cagle
text: I called and asked for rate and availability. The guy said they were available and quoted a price. They held the request, and just now replied they are booked after I called yesterday -- a week later! Now, I have to short notice find someone to move me. Very unprofessional.

resp.text: We apologize for the inconvenience. The move date you initially wanted was (5/17/2017). Unfortunately we booked up for that date.  We are more than happy to provide you with moving services on the evening of Wednesday (5/17/2017) or before or after your requested moving date. Please keep in mind that until a deposit is made, moving services are not confirmed. Please accepted this 10% off coupon on our behalf. Sorry for the miscommunication.

name: Rickeyria Bennett
text: The gentleman were wonderful!!! They were pleasure to work with, hard working and focused on my needs.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing C  & R Movers, LLC

name: W Clausell
