name: Anna Boger
text: I’ve bought several mattress here always great quality and great service!

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we hope you are still enjoying your mattresses. Call us anytime if we can ever be of service to you.

name: Vance Olmstead
text: Another job well done! Best florist in town that always leaves me amazed with their end result!

resp.text: Out of all the great florists in town, Vance, we're flattered to see you think we're the best. There's nothing we love more than helping you out. If you ever need another beautiful arrangement, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Donny Harden
text: thank you to the staff @ Amy's..  We live out of town, I called late morning and placed the order for our daughters birthday. I got a text and picture from daughter at 1:20 of the flowers, she was so excited, in her words "BEAUTIFUL" ...Amy's helped make a daughter and teachers day... THANK YOU!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Donny!  It's our pleasure to make sure every customer is taken care of.

name: Bobby Hagler
text: I ordered flowers for my wife on our 40th anniversary at 4:30 pm on 5/28 to be delivered between 12:00 - 2:00 pm on 5/29. They send an email at 11:57 am on 5/29 cancelling the order. This is pathetic.

resp.text: We apologize for the miscommunication in your order, Bobby. Given the long weekend for Memorial Day, we were closed Saturday and Monday. We also had a technical issue that didn't reflect our correct hours online. We understand your frustration and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If you'd like to discuss this further offline, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Camy Caruso
text: I just called there to order flowers for my daughter in law.  The lady who answered the phone was rude. She acted like it was an inconvenience.  I'm glad I didn't spend my money on the flowers there. And the 1 star was too much. Ordering somewhere else!

resp.text: Camy, I'm so disappointed to hear we've left you with such a poor impression. You should always expect to be treated like a friend when you work with us to create a beautiful arrangement, and I can assure you this was just a misunderstanding. I hope you'll consider giving us the chance to make things right. -Felisha, Owner

name: Neica Asher
text: I ordered flowers online and called with special delivery instructions. Amy's you went above and beyond with your customer service. Thanks for delivering beautiful flowers and being so friendly to the lady that received them. Excellent experience all around!

resp.text: There's nothing like getting to share smiles with our neighbors, Neica. It was our pleasure to deliver the beautiful arrangement for you. Please don't hesitate to give us a call if you ever need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: shirley smith
text: I used Google to find a place to deliver something, out of the ordinary, for a friend staying at a local hotel---and since it didn't require flowers I was at their mercy. The kind receptionist was able to help with everything in a matter of a few minutes... EXCEPTIONAL. Thank you!!

resp.text: Thanks for the support, Shirley! Glad to hear we were able to help out with your delivery. Let us know if you ever need anything else. -Felisha, Owner

name: Teddy Jackson
text: Great experience, Arrangement looked great! I will definitely use Amy's again.

resp.text: Teddy, I'm happy to hear that your order was everything you wanted. Our arrangements are some of the freshest in the area, so we're happy that you'll continue to support us. If you'd like anything specific, feel free to let us know next time. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jeri Moody
text: I called Amy's Florist from Georgia in hopes of ordering a plant for my son's girlfriend who just had surgery. Mark was a pleasure on the phone. He was very helpful in suggesting a plant, as well as tips on how to care for it. The delivery guy was also kind and delivered it promptly as well. I would definitely use Amy's again if I find myself needing another delivery in Tuscaloosa, AL. Thank you!!

resp.text:
Jeri, thanks for the stars! We're so glad to hear we were able to help you out. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else!
-Felisha, Owner

name: Larry Savino
text: I am in New York and needed a Great Easter basket for my Daughter who is in Tuscaloosa for college. I called in morning and the women I spoke with was very polite,Patent,and knowledgeable of her products. I described what I wanted she said NO PROBLEM, ask me for my budget and 3 hours latter my Daughter called and said she loved it. What more could you ask for from a vendor. Thank you to the staff at Amy's I appreciate the great service we received

resp.text: Larry, I know a year has gone by, but I just had to stop and thank you for these wonderful words! I'm happy we were able to help you make your daughter's day. I appreciate your support and hope you won't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: CATHY HOWELL
text: I went in to Amy’s to get a plant for a funeral and there was 3 different people helping us and we got 3 different prices.  So unorganized. Feel as tho they are ripping people off!!  Watch when you order!  NONE of the flowers had prices so we had to ask. We left and went to Stephanie’s where all the plants had prices you knew what you were paying for.

resp.text:
Cathy, we try to be upfront with our prices, so I'm sorry to hear you didn't leave with that impression. I appreciate your feedback, though, and I hope you'll give us another chance in the future. Take care.
-Felisha, Owner

name: Virginia Sanford
text: Always very helpful with choosing the right flower or plant. Also very helpful with last minute needs.

resp.text: Virginia, glad to hear you can always count on us! Thanks for the kind words, and we hope to see you again soon. -Felisha, Owner

name: Mona
text: I was sent some flowers by my boyfriends parents for Christmas. The whole arrangement fell apart when I got it, as they cut the stems so short they wouldn’t even stay in the container. It was mostly filler and the flowers died within 2 days. Highly disappointed.

resp.text: Mona, we're always happy to be a part of such sweet gestures. However, we searched our database history and don't see the transaction you're speaking about. I can assure you that our displays are well-made and always fresh. That's what sets our flowers above the rest. In the future, we're always happy to provide you with a quality arrangement at a moment's notice. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jennifer Stigall
text: Great experience using Amy's Florist! Very nice people to work with!  I definitely recommend using them, and they are LOCALLY Family owned!

resp.text: I know a couple of years have gone by, Jennifer, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this awesome review! Your recommendation means the world to me, and I'm so happy to read you had a great experience here. Please don't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: Christian Parris
text: I had a wonderful experience on the phone ordering flowers for my girlfriend. Cynthia was very helpful and funny

resp.text: Thank you Christian!  We hope your girlfriend enjoys her flowers.

name: M P
text: Terrible Customer Service. In attempt to getting my girlfriend some Halloween themed flowers, Amy's Florist dropped the ball. I placed an order for one item and 5 minutes later they called and said they did not have the item or vase in stock YET I was still charged. After emailing and calling back, I was fully refunded. I decided to try my luck again and place another order but for a different item. Same thing, received a call saying it was not in stock. The people calling me were horribly unhelpful and rude and made it seem like I was to blame. Why have something on your website if it not in stock? I also find it suspicious Amy's Florist and Pat's Florist have the same exact webpage layouts besides color scheme. Trying my luck at a third floral shop and see if I finally can get something...

resp.text: Matthew, I am very sorry you had a bad experience with us. Yes you placed an order off our website that stated NO substitutions.  The closer it has gotten to Halloween we have sold out of most the containers. We would have been glad to do a similar arrangement for you but you said no substitutions. Also you did email us and I got back with you as soon as I seen the email, unfortunately I don't check my emails frequently.  The staff called and left you a message regarding the order, and soon as they spoke with you a refund was issued.  As for the two websites bringing the same...YES they are because a floral company designed them for us.  Nothing suspicious at all about that.  Again, I am very sorry we wasn't able to help you. It is not our goal to lose customers.

name: N Hinton
text: My Dad works here. The manager and staff are very cordial and my father ,one of the delivery guys, is extremely attentive and punctual in delivering the flowers. My Dad's a work-a-holic.

resp.text: I know several months have passed, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this wonderful review! We love having your dad on our team, and we appreciate your reaching out with an all-star rating. -Felisha, Owner

name: Ben Tuckerman
text: Friendly staff. Locally owned. Beautiful flowers. What's not to love!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben! Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else. Take care. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jack Przebienda
text: Flowers were delivered and my girlfriend absolutely loved them. Great Value, would recommend

resp.text: We are so glad she loved them. Thank you for call Amy's Florist. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Andrea White
text:
Really rude people! Terrible customer service.  Called to get more information on their flower arrangements, unfortunately their website is limited on options so I went on their Facebook page and was able to find a lot more options for what I was looking for.  I had to literally described them the flowers I was looking at, and told them it would be easier for them to jump on their page with me .... nop! They started getting all mad and raised their voice over the phone because THEY DIDN'T KNOW how to even use Facebook.  The woman that was on the phone with me even started talking over me.  WILL NEVER buy anything from here and WILL NEVER recommend this place.
One star is even too much!

resp.text: Andrea, we want all of our guests to feel comfortable when talking to us, so I'm sorry to hear about your experience. It sounds like there was a miscommunication here, and I appreciate the feedback. If you do choose to do business with us again, we'll work hard to make it a better experience. -Felisha, Owner

name: Pat Stephenson
text: Nice folks, but somehow they lost the order, it was a funeral so you only get one shot at it.

resp.text: Pat I'm sorry to hear this.  I have researched our data base and I'm not showing where an order was placed in your name.  I surely hope if the order was placed with us, that we took care of you to make sure you where completely satisfied.

name: Holly Holman
text: Extremely disappointed in Amy's.  I just sent my mother a birthday bouquet via Teleflora and paid extra for the Premium bouquet which featured a larger arrangement with more flowers (6 large roses and 6 smaller roses).  My mother just texted a picture of the flowers to say thank you and there are 2 roses and a bunch of filler flowers.  I'm in Kansas City, but believe if I were at home, I would be making my way to have a serious talk with Amy or whoever stole my money.  I could've gotten more money's worth out of a Publix bouquet.  I'm seriously angry.  This was NOT a $95 arrangement.

resp.text:
Hello Holly,
I'm so sorry you were disappointed in the arrangement. It's not our goal to make customers unhappy.  In this situation going through a 3rd party to place an order is not always the best thing to do. You mention you spent $95 on the arrangement but that's not what the sender gave us to work with. Also, out of the total, we had to take out for the 2 balloons and delivery charge that was associated with the order.  Yes, you could have got more flowers from Publix, but I don't sell Publix quality flowers. I only carry the freshest and finest. I agree the arrangement doesn't look like the picture you picked out and I'm more than happy to correct our mistake.  We want every customer to be completely satisfied ...that's our goal. We gain nothing from an unhappy customer!

name: Brian Patterson
text: I certainly wouldn't buy from a place that hangs up on its callers, as a vendor.... very unprofessional

resp.text: Not sure why you would make a statement as such!  My staff and I are very friendly to every caller unless you are a telemarketer.  We all know how annoying that can be.

name: Tara Campbell
text: Not so nice.  The person I ordered from had an attitude the entire time I was on the phone.  UA discount or not, I do not recommend.

name: Dale Dowdle
text: ALWAYS a Great Experience

resp.text: Dale, thanks so much for stopping in! Hope to see you here again, as always! -Felisha, Owner

name: Pat Killian
text: The BEST place in fort Payne for supplies and the BEST staff - - -

name: Richard Hartline
text: They have a very good selection of just about anything a person needs for home health care. The prices are fair and the staff is very friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review. Hope to see you soon!

name: Drew Taylor
text: This family-owned business proves time and time again that they put their customer's first. They're the best Medical Supply company in Fort Payne, Al - Hands down!

resp.text: Thanks for the review Drew Taylor!

name: Beverly Dean
text: Have used them for years. Always very helpful. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We thank you so much for the kind words! Thank you!! See ya soon!

name: Candice Wilbanks
text: Caught them in a lie about something trivial like when they actually ordered what I needed. Its been over a week and a half and still haven't heard from them on item. I would not recommend these people at all.

resp.text:
Candice,

Thank you so much for bringing this matter to our attention. I apologize for the unpleasant experience with our company. This is never our intention. I have followed up on the order and found your product was ordered on August 4th, (the morning after you were in) directly from the manufacturer. The item was backordered when our shipment arrived meaning it actually had to be made rather than just being packed and shipped. Unfortunately the backorder involved two weekends which did add time to the order. I sincerely apologize for your inconvenience and for our failure in communicating more specifically to you regarding your backorder. Again, thank you for your feedback and I apologize once again.    Beth Westmoreland owner

name: leonor jefferson
text: Love this place!!  They took my rescue puppy right away.  She was matted so bad😭but they was able to clean her up to perfection ❣❣❣.. She is well on her way to getting healthy and a new family that loves her.  I highly recommend this place for your pets.

resp.text: Leonor, thank you so very much for your 5 star review! We are so happy that we were able to get your puppy in right away and clean her up to perfection!! We look forward to seeing you all again very soon!

name: Debbie Shepherd
text: I couldn’t be happier with the service at K-9.  Tim, Denise, and their staff give our sweet Hershey the best care ever!  He LOVES to go there!  It is so reassuring when we leave him, to know that he will be so well cared for.  He has special needs since he is diabetic, and they are so attentive and loving.  Recommend it to all!!

resp.text: Debbie, we are glad to have you as our customer. Thank you for sharing your kind words with us. It means a lot to us and our entire team! We absolutely love having Hershey come stay with us and look forward to seeing you guys again soon!

name: Cathy Sumner
text: They're awesome with our pup Tina. She comes home from her spa day smelling great, looking great, and has her nails done.

resp.text: Cathy, thank you so much for this review. We really appreciate you being a customer. We love that your pup always smells amazing after spa days!! We can't wait to see you guys again soon!

name: Wesley Sparks
text: These folks are great! They give excellent trims and services. We have used them for boarding also. Our dog almost jumps out of the car as soon as we pull up because he loves it there. Sometimes I get text updates about him playing while there. Great business owners providing excellent service.

resp.text: Wesley, we are very excited that you guys come to see us! We absolutely love George W and are thrilled to hear that he loves coming to see us!! Thank you so much!!!

name: Beth Mumaw
text: The groomer did what I asked on my westie.  She has very long legs and I do not  like her clipped too short.  The facility is very nice and clean.  I also liked the idea that she was not there all day.  My dog has anxiety when left too long and they notified me as soon as she was finished.

resp.text: Beth, thank you so much for the wonderful review. We are so happy that you are pleased with your westie's groom. We look forward to seeing you guys again soon!

name: Alvin Irizarry
text: Amazing grooming! I have two miniature schnauzers, and I have never seen them look so good after grooming. This will be the place I get my puppies groomed from now on.

resp.text: Alvin, we truly appreciate that you have chosen to have your schnauzers groomed here. We aim to have all our grooms look amazing and super happy that we accomplished this with you!! We can't wait to see you guys again very soon!

name: Susan Comperda
text: We gave K9 a try after having used another location for the past few years with our doodle and yorkies. We provided a picture of our doodle from a past haircut that we liked. We were happy with the results and the price! We also find them to be very professional in their communication with their customers. The place we previously used was not very professional and pricing had gotten ridiculous. We are happy to have found K9!

resp.text: Susan, thank you so much for such kind words. We are so happy that you guys have chosen to come see us for your doodle and yorkies!! We  look forward to seeing you guys soon!

name: Ashley Wilson
text: I called and scheduled boarding and training for my dog back in March. The appointment was made for May. I call today to see if I can drop my dog off a couple days earlier. I was told their is no longer a trainer at this facility and that I will have to call and talk to that trainer. No one called me before hand to tell me these changes have been made. I talk to that trainer and she has none of my information and had no idea about my appointment that was made. So now I have nowhere to board or train my dog because this trainer is already booked. Tim is the one who took my information and scheduled the appointment. I call to talk to Tim about the issue and he is rude and says he can't do anything about it. I would not recommend using this place. They have Horrible communicating and not helpful when it comes to their mistakes.

resp.text: We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience and miscommunication on our part!  We personally do not train; however, we refer you to a trainer. We have had trainers at our facility in the past that we felt were not giving the clients what they needed.  We have found a trainer with 12 years of experiences with all dog training needs.

name: Barbara Arends
text: They do a great job grooming my Yorkie plus she doesn't mind going.  I've boarded her here too and was pleased.

resp.text: Barbara, thank you so very much for the 5 star review! We love seeing you guys!! Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Eric Brugman
text: Best groomer I’ve ever been to. Excellent service and quality work. My dog Noodles has never looked better. Great prices and friendly staff. Definitely going to make them my permanent groomers. I highly recommend their services for anyone looking for a great haircut for their dog.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Eric. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. We look forward to seeing Noodles and you again in the future!

name: Melissa 4r5 Bautista
text:
I LUV THIS PLACE FOR MY PUPPY (ROCKY).HE LUVS DAYCARE!!
IT MAY BE OUT OF MY WAY ,HOWEVER I WOULD DO THE DRIVE BECAUSE I TRUST THIS FACILTY WITH MY DOG.KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK !!(THE DAIRY QUEEN AROUND THE CORNER GIVES A PUPCUP OF ICE CREAM )HE LUVS HIS ICE CREAM TOO !!

resp.text: Melissa, thank you so much for such a wonderful review!! We love seeing Rocky who is such a sweetheart! We truly appreciate that you come out of your way to bring him to see us at daycare!

name: Cynthia Beaudry
text:
Oh my word! I am so amazed by this place.

1. Availability: every other grooming place is booked until February. K9 has openings/availability and was able to get my dog in right away!

2. Affordable: absolutely great pricing and a variety of services.

3. Agreeableness: the whole staff was so friendly. I could tell that my dog in good hands. They were so efficient, my dog was done in just a few hours.

This will be my go to place from now on! Thanks so much!

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback. We try really hard to provide a great experience at K9 Bath Body & Boarding and are really happy to hear that you enjoyed it!

name: David Waring
text: Great boarding service.  Very friendly owners.  Always willing to work with us on late requests.

resp.text: David, thank you so very much for the 5 star review. We are super happy that we are able to accommodate you guys!! We look forward to seeing you guys again soon!

name: Erin Coffey
text: I've been on the search for somewhere to board my dog for quite sometime. My lab, Max, tends to be reactive towards men (making it hard for me to find places that will take him). I brought Max out for a doggy daycare trial run at K9 BBB, and even though it started out a little rough, Tim did everything in his power to make Max comfortable with him. The staff is awesome! The trainer there, Angel, has worked so well with Max and given me so many helpful tips. Now Max is always super excited to go see Tim and the staff and play with all of his friends all day! I highly recommended this place for your fur babies, because your pup will be in the best hands!!!

resp.text: Erin, thank you so very much for such kind words!! We are so excited that Max loves coming to see us. Angel and all the staff are the most dedicated to our customers and pets!! We can't wait to see you guys again soon!

name: Luis Vera
text: Amazing service and my babies look so cute. Thanks K-9 Bath Body and Grroming for an amazing service.

resp.text: Luis, thank you for the five star review. We take great pride in making sure that we provide amazing service and are super excited that you guys chose us!! Hope to see you guys again very soon!

name: Nick Mewbourn
text: I carry my dog (Cooper) here ever weekday and he loves it and they are a awesome group. I wouldn't even think of taking him anywhere else!!

resp.text: Nick, thank you for the 5 star review. We absolutely love seeing Cooper, especially at daycare! He is such a sweetheart!

name: Matthew wilson
text: We put our 10 month old lab in for a 2 week board and train, it was like night and day when we got him back. He would always bark and pull towards people and other dogs, and my 10 year old could not hold him back. Now he walks beside you does not bark nearly as much as he used to and also does not pull away while barking. They went above and beyond to help with our lab. And to top it off they are very friendly and helpful even if I have questions or issues they told me to call and they will help.

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. It’s always so refreshing to hear that we are doing a good job! Everyone here at K9 Bath Body & Boarding loved reading this!!

name: Jessica Walters
text: Talk about going ABOVE and BEYOND! The owner, Tim, personally took time to work with my puppy and guide me through a number of behavioral problems. They were incredibly accommodating with last minute daycare and boarding needs, and their trainer, Angel, was SO knowledgable and professional. I don't usually leave reviews, but I was blown away by their kindness and expertise. They GENUINELY CARE. Cannot recommend enough!

resp.text: Jessica,  we are honestly so grateful for this wonderful review! Thank you for being so positive and putting that positivity out into the world. We can't wait to see you guys again soon!

name: Karen Withrow
text: Love this kennel! They have cared & groomed my pup since they opened & I won't take my schnauzer to any other kennel when we are out of town! Great family & employees!

resp.text: Karen, we truly appreciate your wonderful compliments!! Thank you for your 5 star rating!!

name: Erica Burleson
text: Loved our experience with the friendly staff at k-9! Our sweet dog looked and smelled incredible. Will definitely be returning soon!

resp.text: Thank you so very much for the 5 star review!! We truly appreciate your business. Look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Andrea Brown
text: The owners and staff went out of their way to make our dogs feel at home! We were so pleased that we booked additional boardings! Stop by and check them out!

resp.text: Coco and Tycho were well behaved house guest and a joy to have spent time with those sweet fur babies!  Looking forward to to our next visit.

name: Jennifer Smith
text: I have a very unruly almost 100 lb doodle that thinks he is a 5 lb puppy! These kind people take care of him from Kaitlyn who is an awesome person who cares for his hair and nails etc. to Tim and his wife. Time has taken an interest in my doodle and currently trying to help me break his male aggressive tendencies. These people are wonderful, economical, sweet and friendly and truly care about the pets under their care! The place is exceptionally clean and I have boarded my demanding dog there one time and going for round two this weekend. They care for him when he is not able because of his behavior to join us on our camping trips or other activities. I highly recommend them to anyone needing to have their pet taken care of you will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Hi Jennifer,  thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback. We are so delighted that you rate our service as 5 star as we strive to provide just that for all our customers. We always look forward to seeing you and Clifford!!!

name: Christopher George
text: A little off the beaten path(for me but that's my problem and definitely worth the drive) but I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.  Ms. Kacy took great care of my pup!! Shaped him up nicely so he won't be so hot on the hiking trails. Bath and de-shed definitely helped with his shedding. Will definitely be back!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Christopher. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us—and we agree, Ms. Kayce is truly a gem to have on our team! We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. We look forward to seeing you guys again in the future!

name: Matthew Christopher
text: Nice folks that run this place..5 star miss clicked great place

resp.text: And you only give us a 4 Star?  Ugh that has to be a mistake! We strive so hard to keep the 5 star streak.  What can we do to have you make it a 5 star?

name: Amy Foster
text: My dog, Lucy, has been going here for a little over 2 months. She RUNS to them ready to start her day! She comes home tired and I can tell she’s had a great time. Tim and Denise have been so flexible with my work schedule, it has helped me out tremendously. I can’t recommend them enough! The dogs have plenty of space to run and a clean facility to relax in between play time.

resp.text: Amy, thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. We're glad that customers like you are having a great experience at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We absolutely love Lucy and miss her when she is not with us.

name: Lisa Lebon
text: My little guy, Sonny, has been going to daycare twice a week here!!!!  He is SO excited to get there and so exhausted when he leaves!!  I can tell they take great care of him by his enthusiasm when he sees the staff.  I’ve also had him groomed a couple of times and looks so handsome afterwards!!  Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Lisa, we're happy to see that you had a 5-Star experience at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We love seeing Sonny and getting to spend time with him! Thanks for sharing.

name: Mrs. Jennifer McDowell
text: Had to board our sweet puppy for an extended amount of time Tim and Denise made sure she was truly loved on while we were away. Zoey loved her home away from home. Would highly recommend them for boarding or grooming!

resp.text:
Jennifer, it's always a pleasure seeing you guys. Thanks so much for your positive feedback and good vibes. It was our pleasure to take care of Zoey at her "home away from home" and she fit right in with our pack.
We're happy that you're happy, and we're looking forward to your next visit.

Hurry back!

name: Elizabeth Neumann
text: Our puppy Wesley absolutely loves his time at K-9’s Doggy Day Care. We’ve utilized the service twice now and will definitely be going back. Wesley is only 5 months old so he needs a place to expel his energy; This place is a no-brainer. I’ve also been told that he’s made some new friends! The staff is helpful and knowledgeable. The atmosphere is welcoming and nurturing. We just love it!

resp.text:
Elizabeth, it's always a pleasure seeing you. Thanks so much for your trust in us. We absolutely love seeing Wesley and spending time with him!!

We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us a 5-Star review.

name: Galina Dukes
text: We boarded our puppy there recently the staff was excellent!  They treated him like he was their own dog.  He was well groomed and happy when we picked him up!  Kennels are very clean with wide open spaces to play.  Definitely a repeat customer.

resp.text: Buran is too cute, can't help but love him like your own.  Looking forward seeing him as an adult playing in our 2 acre outside play area.   Thank you for trusting in us with your beautiful babies.

name: Tracey Scott
text: The owners are very nice and you can tell they truly enjoy what they do and they love animals. Buster was treated very well. He looks and smells so good! We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Tracey, seeing that you had a 5-Star experience is the best thing we could hope for! Your review means a lot to us. Thank you for choosing K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We look forward to serving you for many years to come!

name: Meagan Godwin
text: The owners are so nice and very informative, they treat your dog like their own. My dog Riley comes here multiple times a week for daycare and loves it! I used to have an issue with other places where she would be scared when I dropped her off but it has not once been an issue here. She runs straight to the door and doesn’t look back at me. She gets excited the second we pull up and is worn out when she leaves (love that part)! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Meagan, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We take pride in knowing our customers are happy with their experience.We love Riley and look forward to seeing her every week!!

name: Brandon Jennings
text: Owners were very friendly, and you can tell they are in this business because they love animals. Facility is clean and they took the time to get to know my dog Kobe. He was very well taken care of and their prices are very reasonable.  Will definitely use again.

resp.text: Brandon, thank you for such a wonderful review!! We are so grateful for your business and enjoy our time we get to spend with Kobe. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Thomas Evatt (Rocketman978)
text: This is by far the best boarding, grooming, etc. Company in Madison County.  The owner and employees love pets..they are highly recommended by Tasha Yar and Scamper..

resp.text: Thomas, we are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us a 5-Star review. Can't wait to see Tasha and Scamper again very soon!!!

name: Rebecca Shelton
text: They did a great job of fixing my dog’s grooming mishap from another place.  He was shaking with fear on the car ride there, but when I picked him up a few hours later, he was so happy- tail wagging.  Took him back there to board the next week and he had zero anxiety about it!  They went out of their way to wait on us when we were delayed picking him up.

resp.text: Rebecca, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We will share this with the team to let them know to keep up the amazing work.

name: Greg
text: We are very happy with the way they took care of our York and standard poodle, it was very pleasant to pick up fresh cleaned and well-groomed dogs after a weekend away. We'll be using this business again!!  Great job on the poodle's hair!

resp.text: Greg, the team here at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding is thrilled to receive such great rating, thank you.

text: We had a great grooming experience here! The staff was extremely friendly, easy to work with, and accommodating. My pup Kooper loved the environment and enjoyed time playing with other dogs. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this great 5-star review. We really appreciate your business and helping to share the word about K9 Bath Body & Boarding!

No one from the company have not responded to my calls on the reason why you guy's stop after one delivery. Major opportunity just went out the window.

text: They were great, however since the change over, they are rarely open.  I haven't been able to order from here in over a month.  Recommend Waityr.  They seem to cover the same places.

name: Shelby Anderson
text: Drivers are always friendly! Owner called once to tell me they would be late and personally apologized and offered a discount on my next order. Port city is reasonably priced compared to the other delivery services. We are very impressed with Port City Deliveries!

name: Stephanie “Momma Sasade” Sasade
text:
While visiting family I discovered this wonderful
Local company that is the only delivery service for my favorite, Pizzeria Delphina! Prices are fair and they pay their drivers the whole tip plus the delivery fee. Manager on phone was very quick to fix my order before he sent it and food came before the estimated time. I will gladly use this company again and my family has vowed to keep using them as well.

name: Michael Keahey
text: The deliverer called three times concerning the address. The first time I was told that there was no *****North, so I corrected them: *****West. The second time they called they told me that there was no *****South, so again I corrected them. The third time they called (and by this time they were already 30 minutes late) they had me walk outside so that they could more easily find the house, and that would have been fine had they been sure that they were in the right neighborhood. Eventually though, they found me and they gave me a $10 credit for the trouble. I will still only give 2 stars because of my cold order.

name: Leslie Hakanson
text: Friendly and helpful office.  Friendly drivers. Good option when need food but can't get out/away.

text: They put an emphasis on delivering for local restaurants.

Told, by Austin, sorry your are having trouble with the website but I have four other phone calls.  Go handle those phone calls Austin.  Cuz, I certainly will NEVER be calling y'all again.  If I could give you NEGATIVE stars I would.

text: Great experience! We ordered from a different delivery company the night before and it was awful. So very happy to find a company that believes in customer service!

name: mill W
text: Port City Deliveries is a life saver. So many days I work longer than expected and can't get away for a meal. So I hop on the app and find a local place to order from. If the delivery person is running late they call and give a heads up with an apology. I also get texts to let me know when they are close by. They are always pleasant & polite. Tonight I ordered from a Chinese restaurant & my food was all wrong. Wasn't sure if I should contact the restaurant or PCD (since they brought me the food & I couldn't leave work to return it myself). I decided to call pcd. Maaan, I'm so glad I did! *AJ* did not hesitate to solve the issue.  He stepped right up & got the problem solved. Went far and beyond to make it right. Now THAT'S how you handle business! Dwnld the app, it's a game changer for sure.

July 17,2018. Today I was surprised to receive a call from AJ  to follow up. He apologized and  let me know I would be receiving a refund and a credit. I value good customer service and the willingness to go the extra mile to improve upon short falls. I will definitely give Port City Delivers another opportunity to provide great service!!

That said, we could not find your account on our system and we are trying to make things right for you.  Please email us at FetcherOps@fetchmedelivery.com so we can research and make things right for you.

name: ken evola
text: Favorite delivery service in Auburn!

name: Dominic Binkley
text: I ordered carryout from a local Italian restaurant through FetchMe and was told to pick up my meal at 4:15 p.m. But when I showed up, the restaurant told me they don’t open until 5:00, so I had to wait for them to make my food - totally defeating the point of ordering online. I would not recommend ordering through FetchMe.

resp.text:
Hey Dominic, we apologize for the inconvenience due to this. After looking into this matter further it appears that our restaurant partner had altered their ordering hours and did not make us aware. We have since fixed their changed hours so this should not happen in the future. As a locally owned business we value your feedback. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you ordering again from us.

Regards,

Harrison
Owner
FetchMe

name: Jonathan Williams
text: Great to have some local delivery guys in Auburn. My food was delivered quickly and safely. Couldn't recommend these guys enough!

text: Came to visit Auburn and was told to try this App. Not only did they mess up several of my orders from some of the restaurants in the area (Burgerfi, five guys, and a few other places I had never tried before), I was also accused by their customer service of lying about my food not showing up! How about you take some responsibility? HOOORRRRIBLE business who doesn't care about their customers, I bet all of these positive reviews on here are from friends and not actual satisfied customers. Do not waste your time using this app, unless you are fine with your money disappearing and being accused of stealing.

resp.text: Hi Kellyanne, we looked at our customer files and we looked at our customer ratings and feedback.  We can not find the information on the above.  Please send us an email at support@fetchmedelivery.com with your information so we look at your orders and make it right.

-Harrison from FetchMe

Quick, easy service. The next time I visit for a tailgate, I know who I'm reaching out to. And you probably should too.

text: Food was excellent.  The service was wonderful. Server was chipper and very polite even though she'd been there all day. Definitely would like to go back.

We are seeing only one charge and if you have any questions please feel free to contact us at 334-209-7730.

name: harry harp
text: This service is terrible use tiger town to go they’re much less likely to completely butcher your order which they’ve messed up slightly or entirely every time I’ve ordered from them. Also when I called to tell them they butchered my order to the point I didn’t want to eat and they said they’d refund which they did but they refunded $8 for a $12 meal not including the $7 delivery charge and tax and the tip I gave the terrible delivery driver. Either go get your food yourself or order from any other delivery service because this is not worth it.

resp.text: Good morning Harry! Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention.  We acknowledge that sometimes mistakes do happen and am sorry you did not have a great experience.  Your experience is the most important thing to every employee at FetchMe.  We reached out to the restaurant who controls the food quality and have addressed quality control challenges with them given they prepare your food.  We have also reached out to you in order to ensure things have been made right with you.  Please engage our delivery center so we can resolve this to your satisfaction.

text: Good service lots of choices in restaurants. Delivery fees are reasonable and they are quick 😊

name: Allison Palmer
text: I have been conducting regular (frequently, daily) business with TTTG for approximately 2 years, especially since the pandemic set in. While major errors with my orders have been infrequent, I've let go of minor errors which occur fairly often.  Today, however, I've made the choice to NO longer conduct business with them. I ordered from an establishment which serves smoothies, as well as food items. Not only DIDN'T my smoothie arrive, but NO ONE -- not from Tropical Smoothie Cafe, to the driver of TTTG, to those working in the TTTG office -- contact me. They all just took my $ (to inc extra tip for driver) without the courtesy of informing me to make another choice. I'm sure my bill will be adjusted (or that will be a fraudulent charge), but I'm NEVER engaging in business with TTTG again. Thankfully, as a consumer, I have other choices.

name: Kevin Lee
text:
On our recent move to Birmingham, we chose your carrier to be our movers  to help us unload the U-Haul we had driven from our home in Georgia.  We had scheduled them for the afternoon of a Saturday. However our U-Haul broke down on the way and we were unable to be there with the big truck at our scheduled appointment time. They helped my father-in-law unload the smaller U-Haul trailer on Saturday, and they made arrangements to meet us the following morning to help unload the big trailer.
They sent  for able-bodied gentleman who were courteous, well mannered, and strong. I will also give them great credit for being industrious since  we were on able to get the U-Haul up our driveway. They subsequently used one of their cars and our van to transfer our  furniture and boxes from the bottom of our driveway to the top parking area and then unload from there. They worked quickly and safely. They finished the job in much less time than I anticipated it would take them.
My one critique is that some of the boxes marked "fragile"  had things stacked on top of them, and a few boxes with "this side up" arrows  were facing the wrong direction.
Overall – this was perhaps the most positive experience I've had with a moving company! We will definitely use them again to meet are moving needs!

resp.text: Hey Kevin. Thank you again for choosing Your Carrier! It was our pleasure providing the muscle. We are happy we were able to make everything work out.

text: Movers were good, Although I was told by the movers at my house, that because I went along with them taking a few breaks, which they should, that I would be only billed for the four hours that It took, after you deduct the breaks  they took.  Well that didn't last, the office/mgr sent me a invoice for 4 and 1/2 hours and other charges that where not discussed.  Now the movers were very nice and polite, but after I explained the discussion and what I was told I was going to pay for 475.00, instead of original quote of 380.00 and my allowance of paying up to 400,00.  They said no.  So my wife said just pay them, I disagreed but  reluctantly paid them the amt of 475.00.  Not cool in my book .........

resp.text:
Mr. Morris

We apologize about any misunderstandings. Our estimates are always subject to change which we state whenever we give an estimate. We were unaware of any lengthy breaks and this discussion with your movers. We will be calling you to follow up.

text: I've used GTG several times and have had good luck.... until recently. The past three orders have been wrong, and I realize the restaurants put the orders together. But when you order and the driver has a copy of what was ordered, and you pay extra for options that you don't receive, it's frustrating and almost impossible to get a refund for what you didn't receive. I think they should at least check. I've used Door Dash a couple of times and have had great luck and faster service. May be swapping.

text: Gafsden to go was excellent .food could have been better old chicken very tough to eat like the chicken had been under  heat lamps for several hours

Fast delivery and very friendly service!
I’ve used several other delivery services, but Gadsden To Go has always been the quickest. Plus they are a LOCAL business!!

text: I've ordered 3 times from different places and I've not once received my order. I always get confirmation of my order and a delivery time but no delivery so congratulations to those who actually receive their order

name: Yelonda Nance
text:
I love most of the drivers always here right at or before time we have had a hiccup or two but not at Gadsden to go fault what we as human beings need to remember is that everyone is human and prone to error so restaurants make mistakes and blame it on Gadsden to go  remember they do not cook our food nor do they bag our food they only order and deliver (cause I’m lazy lol) the owners have been great at getting these errors fixed and for that alone I’m grateful  thank you from a exhausted wife and mom
And the service you provide !❤️

text: Ordered food tonight. My wife’s meal was missing but I was charged for it. The driver said she was going to go to rock n roll sushi and get the rest of my food. Haven’t heard from her and she won’t respond to me. I’ll never use this rip off service again.

text: I ordered from wings and seafood and for one it almost took 2 hours to get here. Then my wings was wrong I ordered barbecue wings I got Hot sauce mixed with a dash of barbecue....disgusting. When I  go there myself I always get barbecue wings but when they go it always be wrong.I’ll never order from here again .

name: Hope Waldron
text: Would give 0 stars if i could.  Waited hour and a half for our food to be delivered and it to be wrong.  Nothing in the order was correct!.  Called restaurant and they were going to make new plates and to contact gadsden to go to pick it up.  Another hour and a half has gone by and have yet to see them. Have used previously and orders were incorrect but blamed it on being overly busy due to COVID but for orders to be incorrect EVERY time is unacceptable.  Too much money to be such sorry service.

text: We ordered Blackstone through through GadsdenToGo and received our food within an hour. You can't even get your food in an hour if you're inside of Blacktone haha. Great service!

text: I am very displeased and unsatisfied with this service!!! I ordered McDonald's and want lunch and some breakfast items but McDonald's doesn't have all day breakfast anymore, so they called to tell me this and asked if I wanted to remove breakfast  things I said yes they gave my money back for item's  and my food was supposed to be at my house between 12 and 12:30  so here I am very hungry waiting for my food cant walk or drive because I have a broken pelvis and is now after 1 and when I called they told me they just canceled my whole order instead of just my breakfast item and then I cant even reorder my food because they have  removed McDonald's from their site to change it to where it doesn't show all day breakfast so now I'm just hungry without being able to get my McDonald's and that's the only thing that I wanted.

name: Frances Johnson
text: Great fast service and delivery...

name: Emily Ozment
text: This is not the first time my order has been incorrect. I understand there are different difficulties due to Covid 19, however this does not excuse the issues with today’s order. I placed my order at 8:40 am to be delivered at 11:45. I received a call at 12:10 from Gadsden to Go telling me the food would be a “little later”. No problem. The food was delivered around 12:35 the driver handed me the food and left. When I checked the food it was not my order. When I called to tell Gadsden to Go of the issue the person I spoke with honestly I think could care less. In the past when there was an issue it was taken care of/ dealt with quickly. I order from Gadsden to go a lot for our office, but after today I will no longer use this service if the level of indifference to the customers is standard.

name: Daphne Ragland
text: I ordered food and it took over 2 hours to receive. This made me miss my lunch break. The female driver stated she got lost. The driver was filthy and smelled really bed...like pets and smoke. I could not even image what the inside of the vehicle was like. Will NOT use Gadsden to Go again!! PLEASE hire drivers that are presentable if you would like this business to prosper.. because the last thing someone wants is for a nasty and smelly person delivering the food they eat. Thanks!!

Taxe of course but was charged $0.50 for processing, $4 for delivery & then $2.89 tip, which wasn't even 15%. Sorry but take the rest out of the $4. No I'll never use this service again.

name: Mizzuz Mo
text: I used to love them even though prices changed without warning because i don't have a lot of extra money and it was such a treat whenever i could order😛. HOWEVER, i will NEVER use them again since one of the drivers falsified tips!!! I asked the guy in charge about weird extra charges on my bank statement and he said they would probably fall off but second receipt shows the amounts categorized as tips i didn't authorize. And that's just...dishonest and theft😡.

name: D T (Raven)
text: Driver was nice even called to say he was late because he was still waiting on my order and nothing was left out

name: Stephanie Green
text: Only bc I couldn’t give it a zero. Will never use them again! We’ve used them a few times since we’ve moved here and wow today they literally messed up for last time. It’s our anniversary today so we decided we’d stay home and relax so we order from here and OMG where do I begin..Let’s just say three hours later six phone calls, late for work bc still waiting on our food so had to actually jump In the car to run down the road to the nearest fast food to eat a bite before I have to go to work. I’ll never use this business again. Hope y’all have better experiences if u choose to use them.

name: Lacey Harris
text: I have had minor problems here and there with this service and today's issue wasn't that bad, but it's everything rolled into one that just doesn't make it worth it anymore. There are always discrepancies with the menus on the Gadsden to Go site and apps and what the restaurant actually serves. The prices on the site and app compared to just going to get the food are ridiculous. But the food is delivered in a timely manner and USUALLY the communication is pretty good. Today was not the case on that though and I was very disappointed. I think I'll just get off my lazy behind and go get my food from now on. It'll be cheaper, quicker, and more accurate.

name: Eddy Cunningham
text: I ordered at 3:50 pm today. Received  confirmation of my order at 3:57. Delivery at 5:00 pm.  No delivery.  They don''t understand why I have confirmation and no record of my order. They promise to not charge my card.Never again.

name: Melissa Woodard
text: I have never before seen or heard of a chick fill a until I visited sylacauga Alabama. I want to say a special thank you to Micah the franchise owner of this store. Your suggestion of what your employees are like was a blessing in disguise. Not only were they hospitable but they made sure that I got my correct order in a timely fashion. I always like to try something new and I would recommend this place for anyone who is in the area. The food is awesome they got my order correct and the service is the most outstanding I've ever seen. Thank you very much for enlightening my taste buds to something new.

name: lisa perdue
text: The operation of two lines went very smoothly. I could not see the menu when ordering and probably might not ordered the parfait with oreo topping and fruit because it was 3.75 by itself with the combo 6.00. Good though with their famous lemonade I always bought in brookwood mall homewood Alabama as an employee of both end chain stores when I was in retail employment. Things are vastly different these days. I took my minimum wages way more seriously than majority and as a result the easiest to be the odd ball Not defying the odds that hard work pays. It leaves you struggling in poverty. But Im sure that's bitterness rubbing off on me. Got a good photo as my other favorite thing to do getting odd shots most get paid big bucks in print media. My phone controls the best of me but I got this from my destination mall and purpose on a gorgeous stressfilled easter weekend. In auburn Alabama where I worked in undergraduate school there at now gone jcpennys and got my earring piercing on top of my ear that took a year to heal because I kept hitting it with the phone receiver back in 1989 rather than continue commuting on weekends back to my hometown birmingham mall as manager of lingerie and top sales in accessories. When stockings used with garter belts came 3 to a box and my thighs slightly smaller but not much. Its control top reinforced toe now for sharp talon nails on eagle soarers. My joke of the city. And the river a few miles before this chick-fil-a restaurant. If you ordered a ice cream cake from now replaced Badkung Robbins in toomers corner I made it as the cake maker/ decorator for a quarter. Loved that job slicing tubs of ice cream and layering with cake then icing with melted cream inside the cooler before piping your favorite slogan on it. Lastly, was now gone a different cooler in environmental management for water samples which storied life experienced escaped discussion in the water sludge cleaning treatment process I endured to get mosquitos in my puddled location. I will have better to discuss another day when my dining room and laundry socket plugs work again reminding me of my molester's house dynamics that's my Unavoidable problem.

name: Alyson Gulledge
text: After having so many mistakes with my orders throughout the past few months at the Chick-Fil-A in Sylacauga, today really topped it off. After my order being messed up and one of my coworkers not getting lunch, I called and let them know the order was not included. This was around 11:30ish. The girl told me her general manager wasn’t there and she would have to get approval from him to fix my order. And she tried telling me I would have to somehow prove that the order wasn’t included, asked me to bring it all back up there when I had already distributed over 5 orders to my coworkers! Not even 20 minutes later Kayleen Turner called them and she says the general manager is there he is just busy, so they lied and she called them out on it and the girl had nothing to say but she offered to bring us the order. She didn’t even want it anymore so she said no just to refund her money. I get a call HOURS later saying I would have to go in the store and get cash because they can’t process it otherwise. Okay, cool. It was very inconvenient but sure. Shortly after they called me, they called Kayleen and she wasn’t able to answer because she was in the middle of selling a car. So after, she called back and said “Hey I missed a call from y’all, it was probably about the order for Alyson” and the girl HUNG UP ON HER! So I went in and not once did the manager apologize, not once did she seem to care about the inconvenience, I even brought up the fact that her coworker lied to me on the phone and she said “the gm didn’t get here until 11.” I told her it was well after 11 that I called and she had nothing to say, did not apologize, just said “have a good night.” and quickly went on to help another customer. Y’all after working in the food industry for so long, it baffles me how some fast food employees AND managers can be so unprofessional, especially when they work at the number one fast food restaurant in the country and are known for treating customers with kindness. I promise I never want to be THAT person, but there’s only so far you can push me. I have never been one to try to lie and haggle to get free food out of any restaurant, and it pisses me off that THEY messed up my order, lied to me, treated me unprofessionally, but I am looked at by them as one of those customers that was there to cuss someone out over them leaving a chicken nugget out of my nugget meal. It is literally not hard at all to treat a customer the right way and I just can’t comprehend how that is so hard for some people to understand. 😑

resp.text:
Hi, Alyson. I’m sorry you had such a poor experience at my restaurant. As the local owner of only one restaurant, I’m dedicated to training and continuously improving our team of over 80 local employees.

We messed up, and I’m sorry it happened to you.

I’m always replying to guest concerns via phone if given the opportunity so that I can receive feedback, get better, and make situations right.

If you would be willing to speak with me directly, you may leave a message with a manager at my restaurant’s number: 256-245-0096.

I’m a local Franchisee and I care about this community and my team’s job security, so thank you for your feedback.

-Micah Harris, Chick-fil-A at Sylacauga

text: I absolutely love Chick-fil-A and am really glad to have it in my hometown.  However this one, just like everything else in my hometown, is below Chick-fil-A standards.  I use the curbside pickup regularly to obtain points on the app.  They have left stuff out of my order on numerous occasions.  I normally let it go, but the one time I go back and say something the lady does not even apologize for leaving it out of my order.  So I call back to talk to the manager, she apologizes but does not offer to do anything about it or anything.  So when I ask are you going to do anything, she said it was just honey mustard.  That isn't the point, the point is you left it out of my bag when I requested it in there.  If I did not love Chick-fil-A so much and used to work there so I love supporting them I would not go back to this restaurant.  Note this has been the only Chickfila I have ever been too that I have had issues with.

name: Hannah Martin
text: Excellent food, clean bathrooms, and kind staff. I could never have asked for a better Chick-fil-A experience. In all my life I've never been to a better Chick-fil-A than this. When I look back on my visit to this Chick-fil-A it brings me some much joyful delight that I can hardly bear it! This. This Chick-fil-A right here is the reason why i get out of bed every morning. Just knowing that a Chick-fil-A like this exists in this very state, country, continent, world, solar system, galaxy, and universe makes me happy beyond compare! Please take a nice little trip to this Chick-fil-A and you will surely experience this same feeling of utter and complete ecstasy as I did when walking into this fine eating establishment. Thank you for existing.

resp.text: Thank you, Hannah, for visiting our locally owned and operated Chick-fil-A at Sylacauga! It’s our pleasure to serve you.

text: Best delivery service in town!! Expand to the beach!!

resp.text: Thank you . We will consider that recommendation. Which beach needs our service ?

name: Hannah Tucker
text: Every time we order Kat’s Delivery we are super satisfied! Luci, Myles, and Austin have delivered to us and they are always so kind and make sure we have everything we need! We will definitely keep using Kat’s!

resp.text: Thank you so much.

name: Jay Clyce
text: Are you looking for quality service and professionalism, to deliver your food?  KATs Delivery is a great choice.  I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you Jay for the recommendation. We are here to make a difference one order at a time !

name: Steven Scott
text: Every time we use them fast delivery in less time than it would take me to go get it myself.  Busy days at work everyone eats anything they want within surrounding areas.  Drivers are always very nice.

resp.text: Thank you Steven. We appreciate your continued support.

name: Robin Connell
text: So grateful tonight that our little town has Kat's Delivery. Our family had a rough day today. As I'm on my way home I have my son order our food from a very well put together website. Paid added the tip and got a delivery time. Our food arrived shortly after getting home and was exactly what we needed. So thank you Kat's for servicing our small town. You have no idea how you helped us tonight.

resp.text: Thank you so much for trusting the KaTs Team. It’s our honor and our pleasure .

name: Jamie McGinnis
text: KATs is a fantastic company. We love the mission of KATs and the easy access to grocery and food delivery it gives people! 5 STARS!

resp.text: Thanks Jamie for the kind remarks.

name: Ryan Northcutt
text:
Not sure why the company doesn't tip the people who make the food (they work for tips). So if you order from them you are making someone work for free to make your food. The drivers get tipped but the employees at the restaurant who did all of the work get nothing. Please look into fixing this problem as there are more and more people using your service. Thanks.

EDIT: not sure about the rude response from this owner, my mother works in the medical field and I don't know anyone from Longhorns. I was referring to a different restaurant. No one is trying to shake you down, just trying to give feedback!

resp.text:
Ryan , the employees at Longhorn where your mom works get a salary / hourly wage from Longhorn Steakhouse in Alabaster . Every driver doesn’t always get tipped and when they do they have maintenance and gas on their vehicles . This review should be for people who used our service
Not for people who are upset they didn’t get a tip . We deliver to all our customers with or without a tip . Your mom should serve her customers . I will send someone to management in longhorns in the morning to let them know what their employees are
Up to harassing Longhorns customers when their off . Y’all are trying to shake Kats down like a NewYork mobster looking for his cut on a private business .

name: Amanda Mercer
text: Great locally owned company. Drivers are friendly and communicate with customers during the delivery process! We love KATS!

resp.text: Thank you for all your support!

name: Isabel Santiago
text: Maurice is the kindest individual you’ll ever meet. Love supporting his business!

resp.text: Thank you Isabel for your support and kind words.

name: John H. Stubbs III

resp.text: Thank you sir. We appreciate the feedback.

name: Andrew Simmons
text: I was in town on business and had the pleasure of ordering from KAT's Delivery. What a surprise it was. My food was on time, the driver was neatly dressed, and none of the transaction made me feel uncomfortable. I love ordering from the locals when I'm in any city, and this delivery service is five star all around!

resp.text: Andrew, Thank you for your review. We look forward to serving you when your in Bham.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review

resp.text: Michelle , thank you . It was our pleasure and we will see you again soon .

text: Hate the owners

name: Jessica Allen
text:
The drive through system at this location is the worst design I've ever seen! Wrap around the building twice just to order?! Merging twice in a drive through?!
I've been to many different Chick Fil A's in many different states. I've been to busy locations in cities multiple times larger than Daphne.
Never again will I even attempt this location.

name: Super Mom Cooley
text: I shared this on my personal page but also wanted to give kudos here. I tell you what....Chic Fila has it going on. They should train ALL fast food restaurants!!! The line was wrapped around the building THREE TIMES. They had FOUR people in the RAIN serving the guest to keep the line moving. I got in line at 7:54 and had my food at 8:11. That is 17 min for about 50 cars. It would take other FF places that long to serve 5. They are COMMITTED TO EXCELLENCE and do it with a smile and friendly. Good job chic Fila! These girls need a RAISE!

name: Jan Serrano
text: I love Chick-fil-A and always go to this location. The food is good and hot most of the time but sometimes they don’t give you everything. Very nice employees when I do curbside pickup. The delivery service I didn’t really like they take a long time to come and the girl didn’t even knock or anything to let me know she brought the food. If I wouldn’t have checked my phone I wouldn’t have known.

name: Phyllis Jones
text: First visit to this location. Pleasant experience! Tried the grilled spicy chicken. It was ok. I think I'm just tired of fast food.

name: Crystal Osborn
text: The only place where the salad still tastes good even when they forgot to give you your dressing and toppings.

name: ArkanShadowFox H.E.B.
text: Our food was not really up to par. First, my sister's salad was missing its avocado ranch, and my food was not great. My fries were over salted and chicken was burnt tasting on the outside.

name: Jennifer Northcutt
text: Service is super fast,even when the line is wrapped around the building! Don't let the long lines fool, it's really only about a 7-10 min wait. Staff is always in good spirits!

name: David and Diana George
text: We ordered on the app and showed up at the appointed time to pick up our food.  We parked in the place where we were instructed to park.  We waited 20 minutes for the food.  I finally had to get out of the car and flag down an employee.  5 minutes later, our food showed up.  No apology, no explanation.  We have been to other Chick-fil-A's and always received great service.  This one is an anomaly.  I don't recommend visiting this location.

name: Wyatt Brackin
text: They show up every morning about 430 to prep there food for quality and prep their minds for achieving greatness

name: L0RD CRONUS
text: So.. the drive through line is very very long around noon. Not their fault but still something to be aware of when coming to this location. Somehow with the drive through and the pick up curbside they still manage to be reasonable quick. By quick I mean it only took me 30 minutes to get in line, order and leave. Other franchises I'm sure it would if taken way longer. Food was very hot and fresh when I picked it up, stage was very friendly and organized for the amount of traffic they had. Very happy with my visit, I recommend going here when it's not as busy, but if you go at lunchtime you pretty much know the deal.

Fast , efficent, service and order is Always correct.  Many other fast food resturants should learn how to do the same.  Long lines move very fast. Cudos to Chick-fil-A.

I called the restaurant & asked them what was going on & the girl on the phone told me it would be out shortly... it wasn’t. I called again and just asked her to cancel it because I had to go to my appointment. She told someone in the background to take it to me. And I told her I was already on the way out and she just hung up on me mid-sentence. Like I said, I love CFA & usually service is great. But the girl on the phone was so rude today and they seemed the need a couple more employees.

text: Placed a curbside order. Watched the line in the drive thru go around twice while I waited 20 mins for food. After waiting that long, I cancelled my order and left.

text: Quickest drive thru in the business, excellent food & customer service... But you knew that!

text: The service and the food is AWESOME 👌just had lunch THERE TODAY☺️☺️

text: Obviously amazing. Here’s the new epidemic menu

name: Luke Mitchell
text: They have a system down for the drive thru which great except if you don't know the menu by heart. Yes they have a little portable menu, but if they are going to operate that way they should move menu boards earlier in line. I ordered a meal and never got my fries, also make sure you remember to ask for any sauce as they do not remind you at the window.

name: Joshua Herron
text: Always fantastic.

name: Patricia Kenny
text: Very friendly and excited workers providing fast and excellent service. Great food too!

name: B C
text: Drive thru layout is impressive and efficient.

name: Crystal Clark
text: Always Great

name: Davis Martin
text: Chicken was good af

name: Isaac Graham
text: Fast service and quality food. The workers are very friendly and accommodating. The lines are usually not too long but even when they are, it moves pretty quickly. When I ordered my 2 meals and a sandwich, my food was ready in less than 5 minutes. I was very impressed by how quickly I was served. The chicken sandwiches and waffle fries were delicious as usual. It's always a pleasant experience.

name: Ms. Anderson
text: Is there such a thing as a bad chick fil a lol I think not

name: Annie Hickey
text: They have a really terrific sausage biscuit!

name: Walter “Roy” Edwards
text: Good food as expected exceptionally good service.  However, had to ask for Chic sauce .

name: Lauren M.
text: I asked for my chicken biscuit to be well done and they told me they don’t do that anymore. I hate when my skin is running off the chicken from lack of being cooked all the way if I saw where I could post a pic I would I don’t see what’s the problem about cooking somebody’s food well done when I’ve always got my chicken biscuit well done and this is the only chick fila I’ve ever had nuggets from that don’t taste or feel fresh and hot after you specifically asked for them to be dropped fresh

name: Christy Davis
text: Can never go wrong with the original chicken sandwich! I love extra pickles on mine!

name: Ginny Mitchell
text: I am a huge Chick-fil-A fan.  The food here is always hot and amazing.  Unfortunately, the last two times we have been here, we have spent 20+ minutes in line.  They try to mainstream the process by having various people take your order outside.  Unfortunately, it still goes slow when getting the food.

name: Brian R. Hampton
text: Always a great experience. Excellent customer service, fast food, hot food

name: Tim Allen
text: Food & Staff were great as usual & had unexpectedly run in to relatives at the restaurant.

name: Paul Romanick
text: Thank You for the 12 days of Christmas rewards. May you and all your employees have a very Blessed Christmas and 2020.

name: Robbie Miles
text: It good chicken

name: Lindsey Scott
text: Love this chick fil a!! They are always so friendly and efficient! I’ve never experienced a problem here! All the staff make you feel right at home and go out of their way to give a good experience! Keep up the great work, you guys are fantastic!!

name: EastCoast Stinnett
text: Review not needed. Always quick, extremely pleasant, and top notch. They are so good, I was annoyed on my last trip that they left off one of my 4 sauces (I always get an unnecessary amount of sauces). That's how on point they are always.

name: Scottie Swindle
text: I’m amazed at how quickly the drive through operates! Polite workers. I have never had a negative experience at Chick-fil-A!

name: Alaina Gray
text: Literally the worst chick fil a I’ve ever visited . My order is always wrong

name: Paul McLain
text: Food is always good but the drive thru is a challenge. Be prepared to wait. If there was more parking it would help.Better to go in.

name: Faraz Anjum
text: I really love daphne chick fill a, I go there a lot more than couple of times a week. There is someone is really rude I reported her one time seem like, after that it has gotten worse since I reported. so I was in line and was the  next person to place my order she was watching me in line and not call me to take my order, other cashier was taking someone else order and when other cashier called me to take my order she called the person who was behind me and took that persons order I did not really care if she called me or not to take my order but after that my next visit I had a pick up inside chick fill a and she is the one who handed me my order, the way she handed me my order was really rude, I can’t really describe in Writhing, I hope someone else takes my order next time I am there if not I think I am gonna be going to Spanish fort chick fill a.

name: zach tolleson
text: Chick fil a does fast food right. The people working there are always friendly and make the customer experience, the food is always hot and there is never a wait for your food. While the menu is limited, they have perfected chicken whether fried or grilled.

name: Randy Lawson
text: Always the best

name: Cynthia Cribbs
text: Awesome 😎

name: Heather R. Houston
text: Fantastic as always!!!  Service & Food Excellent!

name: Sam Shorrosh
text: Always packed, always superior service, very clean, friendly staff, excellent food.

name: Brad Johnson
text: There really should be more places like this! The workers actually put in the effort to make it the best experience possible and the quality of food is some of the best fast food available. Also the playground is a nice bonus if you have kids and the ice cream cone coupons and gift cards are great to give and receive. Also the condiments are the best.

name: Jean Jenkins
text: Drive-thru cars wrapped around the building ... pretty much sums it up! Great food, efficient and courteous crew.

name: Lillie Ray
text: Always excellent

name: erica fultz
text: Yall always nice & I love that you have a reward program in your app.

name: bridget
text: Best staff out of any restaurant out there. Super fast and accurate too.

name: Pamela Burckel
text: This location have  the typical good food, friendly service is a clean place that I visit every time that I pass through Tallahassee, unless it's a Sunday when they're closed.

name: Mike Pancoast
text: Really long line but it didn't take as long as I thought it would.

name: Rhonda W
text: Breakfast was great, I received the wrong item, but they provided the correct item quickly and professionally. Great experience as always.

name: Frank Trotter
text: I gotta' give a shout out to Kenya, who took my order with the biggest smile on her face you could ever see. I had a bowl of spicy deliciousness which is also called their Taco Soup. I mean, it was so good, I wanted to lick the bowl and prolly would have if I wasn't inside the restaurant. BTW, Briggs and Thane were outside doing a great job taking orders in the rain to keep that drive thru moving along but they also took the time to greet me and hold the door open for me. The Daphne Chick-fil-A is such a quality place--great ownership, great team members, and quite honestly there were a bunch of fun people in there tonight and every single one of them also had a smile on their face...but not as big as Kenya's smile was!

name: Donnie Ricketts
text: Always friendly staff. Always good food. Never a problem. Great place to eat.

name: Paul Spencer
text: Typical of all Chic Fila restaurants, the service was awesome!

name: Jessica Torres
text:
I have been going for my lunch break once a week, and the service is excellent. Even though the line is long, their system keeps it moving. The staff is efficient and polite.
Their drive through is confusing. You need to circle the building to get in the line.

name: Sheree “Gigi” Thornton
text: Fast, friendly and I have never been displeased with the quality of the food.

name: Bob Carlen
text:
Ordered a kids meal plus my food and spent 24.00$
My child saw other children with a free ice cream . Went to get one for my child and they refused to give it to her because she had already taken the plastic off of her toy. Not fair as far as I’m concerned! Especially since we had the kids bag and toy in our hand and had been there for at least two hours! I also was never told she could even have the free ice cream and no rules about opening the toy were posted.

name: Scotty Stimpson
text: Excellent Chick Fil A! Great staff and speedy service!

name: Sandra Felsher
text: Took us 25 minutes to get our mobile order..not the service i have come to expect from chick fil a.  However, as we were eating our fresh hot meal , the manager came over, apologized for the wait time and told us he comped our entire meal. That is why i love chick fil a! I have come to rely on  their great service but no one can be perfect all the time and how you handle those bad days makes all the difference!

name: Daniel Retzloff
text: Suspiciously nice and efficient inside this joint.  I mean like maybe they are robots or something.

name: Susan Miles
text:
Easy to get to from the street, but a pain to get out of. There's a road with a light on the north side of Target.
Always clean. Prompt, courteous service. Will bring your food to your table if dining in. And one of the last places that have a play area. Also kept very clean. The food is great, as always.

name: Tabitha M.
text: Normally I’m 100% satisfied with this location (other than the super long lines) which is why I’m giving 3 stars.. but today my chicken sandwich was soggy and fell apart, chicken was in like 3 pieces instead of one patty and had soggy breading, and my fries were not cooked all the way and the drive thru worker seemed annoyed and not pleasant. Thought I was at McDonald’s for a sec

name: Allen Hollis
text: Excellent service as expected, amazing staff and great food.

name: Dianna McClure
text: It is sort of tricky to maneuver into the drive thru at this Chick-fil-A. Then there is no screen to look at. A hostess politely takes your order but I am not familiar with the menu so I had to request one. The service was fast and food was hot..order was correct.

name: Karen Peacock
text: Hey, it's Chick-fil-A...   No more needs to be said.   Food is delicious and employees are the best!   Even if there's a long line in the drive-thru, it still doesn't take long!   They do an A+ job!!

text: Seemed very detached tonight. Got my drink wrong and that's my favorite part..then my fries  were half full. Not the best visit visit

text: Best customer service and most friendly staff of any fast food restaurant.

text: This restaurant is very clean and orderly, the staff is always in a good mood, greeting you with a smile and leaving you with a "My Pleasure".  The bathrooms are clean, the food is delicious and the atmosphere of being here keeps you wanting to come back over and over again.  GREAT Family Place to Eat!

If you want GREAT service and food like you expect go to Chic Fil A in Spanish Fort on HWY 181. WELL worth the drive.

name: Regina Stanton
text: My son loves it here and he refuses to eat chicken nuggets unless they are from chic-fil-a! 😄 my food is always hot and fresh.  The play are gives incentive for my son to eat all his food then he plays while I get to enjoy my food. Win-win 😁 always clean. And impeccable service
